analyzed: rnal 'byor pa chen po pa rnams kyi bskyed pa'i rim pa ni rnal 'byor bzhi dang ldan pa'i dang po sbyor ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa'am rdo rje bzhi pas so //
translated: The generation stage of the yogins of the Great Yoga is by the process of the concentrations of the first union and so on, which are endowed with the four yogas, or by the four vajras.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni bsgom pa du ma ste /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni bsgom pa du ma ste /
translated: The perfection stage is the many meditations.

original: dper na phra mo'i rnal 'byor ni so sor snang ba tsam gyi rang bzhin ni shel dag pa lta bu'i rnam pa 'od zer gyi sbyor bas so //
analyzed: dper na phra mo'i rnal 'byor ni so sor snang ba tsam gyi rang bzhin ni shel dag pa lta bu'i rnam pa 'od zer gyi sbyor bas so //
translated: For example, the subtle yoga is by the process of the light rays of the aspect of the pure crystal nature, which is merely the appearance of each.

original: thig le'i rnal 'byor ni sna gsum gyi rtse mor dgod pa'i khams gsum ma lus pa'i ngo bo phra zhing dang ba'i thig le tsam bsgom pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: thig le'i rnal 'byor ni sna gsum gyi rtse mor dgod pa'i khams gsum ma lus pa'i ngo bo phra zhing dang ba'i thig le tsam bsgom pa'i rim pas so //
translated: The yoga of the drop is the stage of meditating on the mere subtle and clear drop, the essence of all three realms, placed at the tip of the three channels.

original: yang na rtsa'i kun tu rgyu bas byang chub kyi sems yongs su g-yo bas so //
analyzed: yang na rtsa'i kun tu rgyu bas byang chub kyi sems yongs su g-yo bas so //
translated: Or, it is by the movement of the bodhicitta through the channels.

original: yang na padma'i nang du dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: yang na padma'i nang du dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'i rim pas so //
translated: Or, it is by the stage of meditating on the commitment wheel within the lotus.

original: yang na rtsa thams cad kyi khung bu nas 'pho ba'i byang chub sems kyi steng du bzlog par 'gyur bas bde ba chen po'i nyams su myong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis so ;
analyzed: yang na rtsa thams cad kyi khung bu nas 'pho ba'i byang chub sems kyi steng du bzlog par 'gyur bas bde ba chen po'i nyams su myong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis so ;
translated: Or, it is by the samƒÅdhi of the experience of great bliss, which is the reversal of the bodhicitta that moves through all the channels.

original: / rdo rje nor bu'i nang du chud pa'i thig le h'um phat la sogs pa'i sa bon sngon du 'gro bas 'dzin pa'am snyoms par zhugs pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jug pas ro gcig par byed pa'i rnal 'byor gyis sam /
analyzed: / rdo rje nor bu'i nang du chud pa'i thig le h'um phat la sogs pa'i sa bon sngon du 'gro bas 'dzin pa'am snyoms par zhugs pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jug pas ro gcig par byed pa'i rnal 'byor gyis sam /
translated: The yoga of making one taste is the yoga of holding the bodhicitta that has entered the vajra jewel, preceded by the seed syllables such as h≈´·πÉ and pha·π≠, or the yoga of making one taste by the entry of the tathƒÅgatas at the time of union.

original: de las ma lhung ba'i byang chub kyi sems de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i blos lces yang dag par myong ba'i rim pas sam /
analyzed: de las ma lhung ba'i byang chub kyi sems de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i blos lces yang dag par myong ba'i rim pas sam /
translated: The bodhicitta that does not fall from that is the stage of the tongue experiencing the mind that is the composite of all tathƒÅgatas.

original: yul dang dbang po phrad pa dang de'i rnam par dag pa dang byang chub kyi sems de spro ba dang de 'dzin pa dang / nam mkha'i gtos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba dang ; thams cad yongs su sdud pas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba yan lag drug gi rim pas so //
analyzed: yul dang dbang po phrad pa dang de'i rnam par dag pa dang byang chub kyi sems de spro ba dang de 'dzin pa dang / nam mkha'i gtos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba dang ; thams cad yongs su sdud pas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba yan lag drug gi rim pas so //
translated: Or, the stage of the six limbs is called the stage of the six limbs: the meeting of the object and the sense organ, the purification of that, the emission of the bodhicitta, the retention of that, the entire realm of space filled with all tathƒÅgatas, and the meditation on the great seal of MahƒÅvajradhara through the complete gathering of all of them.

original: yang na rim pa lnga ste rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa ni ngag rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na rim pa lnga ste rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa ni ngag rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Or, there are five stages: The stage of vajra repetition is for the sake of purifying the voice.

original: sems rnam par dag pa ni sems la dmigs pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: sems rnam par dag pa ni sems la dmigs pa'i rim pas so //
translated: The purification of the mind is through the stage of observing the mind.

original: kun rdzob kyi bden pa rnam par dag pa ni rang byin gyis rlob pas so //
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi bden pa rnam par dag pa ni rang byin gyis rlob pas so //
translated: The purification of the conventional truth is through self-consecration.

original: don dam pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pa ni mngon par byang chub pas so //
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pa ni mngon par byang chub pas so //
translated: The purification of ultimate reality is by manifest enlightenment.

original: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug pa ni zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pas so //
analyzed: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug pa ni zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pas so //
translated: The entry into the realm of non-abiding nirvana is by the stage of the concentration of union.

original: sems dpa' @64a * //
analyzed: sems dpa' @64a * //
translated: The two heroes

original: gnyis ni ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon gyi thig ler 'jug par bya ste /
analyzed: gnyis ni ye shes sems dpa'i sa bon gyi thig ler 'jug par bya ste /
translated: are the two heroes, the seed-essence of the gnosis hero, which is to be entered.

original: de tsam gyi nga rgyal la gnas pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: de tsam gyi nga rgyal la gnas pa'i rim pas so //
translated: This is by the stage of abiding in the pride of just that.

original: ril por 'dzin pa dang rjes su gzhig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rang bzhin dang gzhan gyi rgyud la gnas pa'i lus la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa bkag pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: ril por 'dzin pa dang rjes su gzhig pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rang bzhin dang gzhan gyi rgyud la gnas pa'i lus la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa bkag pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: By the concentrations of grasping the whole and subsequent destruction, the conceptualizations of body, etc. , which are in one's own continuum and in the continuums of others, are blocked.

original: de dang 'dra ba gzhan yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba dang / rtsa yang dag par rgyu ba la sogs pa gang yin pa dang / de dag thams cad rim pa lnga por 'dus par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba gzhan yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ba dang / rtsa yang dag par rgyu ba la sogs pa gang yin pa dang / de dag thams cad rim pa lnga por 'dus par rig par bya'o //
translated: Also, other similar ones are the concentrations of the perfection stage, which will be explained below, and whatever is the movement of the channels, etc. , and all of them are to be known as included in the five stages.

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i phyogs 'di gang zag lnga 'dul ba'i yul can gang yin pa de'i dbye bas 'og nas kyang 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i phyogs 'di gang zag lnga 'dul ba'i yul can gang yin pa de'i dbye bas 'og nas kyang 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: This great yoga is the domain of the five kinds of persons who are to be disciplined, and its divisions will be explained below.

original: da ni 'di ltar dpyad par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni 'di ltar dpyad par bya ste /
translated: Now, this should be analyzed:

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gsungs pa de dag las bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa po'i gang zag gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gsungs pa de dag las bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa po'i gang zag gang zhe na /
translated: From among those things taught by the Lord, what is the person who meditates on the creation stage?üîΩIt is said:

original: smras pa / dbang po dman pa dang bar ma dang / rab ni tsandan la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: smras pa / dbang po dman pa dang bar ma dang / rab ni tsandan la sogs pa'o //
translated: The inferior, middling, and superior faculties are the sandalwood and so forth.

original: de'i phyir de dag tshogs la bshad pa la snod yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de dag tshogs la bshad pa la snod yin no //
translated: Therefore, they are vessels for the explanation of the assembly.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba ni rtog pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba ni rtog pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
translated: The so-called creation stage is the yoga of imagination.

original: phung po dang khams dang skye mched tha mal pa spangs te /
analyzed: phung po dang khams dang skye mched tha mal pa spangs te /
translated: Having abandoned the ordinary aggregates, elements, and sense bases,

original: de bzhin nyid dang phyag mtshan dang sa bon las spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim pas phyag rgya bsgom pa yin no ;
analyzed: de bzhin nyid dang phyag mtshan dang sa bon las spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim pas phyag rgya bsgom pa yin no ;
translated: one meditates on the seal by the process of emanating and gathering from suchness, the insignia, and the seed.

original: / de bas na spros pas bsgrub pa'i phyir rnal 'byor pa sa brgyad pa la gnas par gyur nas de'i 'og tu dad pa la sogs pa'i chos la mthar phyin pas de rnams kho na dbang po rno bar 'gro bas na rin po che lta bu'i gang zagüîΩtu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / de bas na spros pas bsgrub pa'i phyir rnal 'byor pa sa brgyad pa la gnas par gyur nas de'i 'og tu dad pa la sogs pa'i chos la mthar phyin pas de rnams kho na dbang po rno bar 'gro bas na rin po che lta bu'i gang zag tu 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, because of the accomplishment of elaboration, the yogi, having attained the eighth stage, then, by perfecting the qualities of faith and so forth, becomes a person who is like a jewel, because of having sharp faculties.

original: la lan re gser khung lta bu'i tha dad pa'i rigs tsandan la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: la lan re gser khung lta bu'i tha dad pa'i rigs tsandan la sogs pa yin no //
translated: Some are like a gold mine, and some are of different types, like sandalwood and so forth.

original: de'i phyir gang bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa po de dag de'i rigs can kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gang bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa po de dag de'i rigs can kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, those who meditate on the creation stage are of that type.

original: gang rin po che lta bu'i gang zag gang yin pa de rnams tha dad pa ste /
analyzed: gang rin po che lta bu'i gang zag gang yin pa de rnams tha dad pa ste /
translated: Those who are persons who are like jewels are of different types,

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgom pa po kho na'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgom pa po kho na'o //
translated: and are meditators on the completion stage alone.

original: de bas na de rnams kyis bskyed pa'i rim pa ma bsgoms pas kyang rdzogs pa'i rim pa gcig pu sgom pa la dbang pa ste /
analyzed: de bas na de rnams kyis bskyed pa'i rim pa ma bsgoms pas kyang rdzogs pa'i rim pa gcig pu sgom pa la dbang pa ste /
translated: Therefore, they are not able to meditate on the creation stage, but are able to meditate on the completion stage alone.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa tshe snga ma la goms pa'i phyir zhes skyon med do //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa tshe snga ma la goms pa'i phyir zhes skyon med do //
translated: There is no fault, because they are accustomed to the creation stage in a previous life.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas shing //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas shing //
translated: For those who are well-established in the stage of generation,

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod rnams la //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod rnams la //
translated: and who desire the stage of completion,

original: thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis//
analyzed: thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis//
translated: this method was taught by the perfect Buddha

original: @64b skas kyi rim pa lta bur gsungs //üîΩzhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: @64b skas kyi rim pa lta bur gsungs // zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: like the steps of a staircase.

original: de la gal te bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gi ngo bo mi bzod nas myur ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phyag rgya la dmigs te rim pa la bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: de la gal te bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gi ngo bo mi bzod nas myur ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phyag rgya la dmigs te rim pa la bslab par bya'o //
translated: If one is unable to bear the essence of the BhagavƒÅn's speech, one should focus on the consort with swift concentration and train in the stages.

original: yang na med na de'i tshe snga ma bzhin du rdzogs pa'i rim pa nyid bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na med na de'i tshe snga ma bzhin du rdzogs pa'i rim pa nyid bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Or, if that is not possible, then at that time one should meditate on the stage of completion as before.

original: goms pa'i rim pas ci zhig bya zhes gang gsungs pa de ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i go rims la slob pa'i phyir yin gyi /
analyzed: goms pa'i rim pas ci zhig bya zhes gang gsungs pa de ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i go rims la slob pa'i phyir yin gyi /
translated: What is meant by what is the use of the stages of practice? is for the sake of training in the sequence of the stage of completion,

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa la ni ma yin no zhes skyon gang yang med de /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa la ni ma yin no zhes skyon gang yang med de /
translated: not for the stage of generation. There is no fault at all.

original: de la 'di ltar dpyad par bya ste /
analyzed: de la 'di ltar dpyad par bya ste /
translated: This should be analyzed as follows.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa gtsor gyur pa rim pa lnga po yin na de'i tshe rim pa'i grangs kyis rnal 'byor pa'i rim pa lnga po yin nam gcig yin zhe na /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa gtsor gyur pa rim pa lnga po yin na de'i tshe rim pa'i grangs kyis rnal 'byor pa'i rim pa lnga po yin nam gcig yin zhe na /
translated: If the five stages are the main ones of the perfection stage, then are the five stages of the yogi also five?

original: gal te gcig yin na de'i tshe rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa nyid kyis bya ba byas pa'i phyir rim pa gzhan gyis ci zhig bya /
analyzed: gal te gcig yin na de'i tshe rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa nyid kyis bya ba byas pa'i phyir rim pa gzhan gyis ci zhig bya /
translated: If they are one, then since the stage of vajra repetition itself has done its work, what is the use of the other stages?

original: de la yang ma ning gi bzlas pa la sogs pa'i skabs su 'od gsal pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yang ma ning gi bzlas pa la sogs pa'i skabs su 'od gsal pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And in the context of the neutral repetition, etc., clear light is taught.

original: lnga yin na ni de'i tshe re re dag la ngag rnam par dben pa la sogs pa yin gyi sems rnam par dag pa la sogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lnga yin na ni de'i tshe re re dag la ngag rnam par dben pa la sogs pa yin gyi sems rnam par dag pa la sogs pa ma yin no //
translated: If they are five, then in each of them there is verbal isolation, etc., but not mental purification, etc.

original: de bzhin du gzhan dag gi'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan dag gi'o //
translated: And so for the others.

original: smras pa / rnal 'byor pa gcig pa yin gyi lnga ni ma yin no //
analyzed: smras pa / rnal 'byor pa gcig pa yin gyi lnga ni ma yin no //
translated: It is said: They are one yogi, not five.

original: gang gi phyir bskyed pa'i rim pas ting nge 'dzin gsum po de nyid la dmigs te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bskyed pa'i rim pas ting nge 'dzin gsum po de nyid la dmigs te /
translated: Because the three meditative stabilizations of the generation stage are observed.

original: rigs brgya'i dbye bas lus rnam par dben pa la 'jug go //
analyzed: rigs brgya'i dbye bas lus rnam par dben pa la 'jug go //
translated: By the division into one hundred families, one enters into the voidness of the body.

original: de'i rjes su yi ge gsum 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis rdo rje'i bzlas pa la goms pas ngag rnam par dben pa la 'jug go //
analyzed: de'i rjes su yi ge gsum 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis rdo rje'i bzlas pa la goms pas ngag rnam par dben pa la 'jug go //
translated: After that, by the process of the entry of the three syllables, etc., one becomes familiar with the vajra repetition, and one enters into the voidness of speech.

original: de'i 'og tu snang ba la sogs pa'i ye shes gsum rnam par dag pas de rdzogs pa na sems rnam par dben pa la 'jug go //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu snang ba la sogs pa'i ye shes gsum rnam par dag pas de rdzogs pa na sems rnam par dben pa la 'jug go //
translated: After that, when the three intuitions of appearance, etc., are purified, one enters into the voidness of mind.

original: rang byin gyis rlob pa'i rim pas kun rdzob kyi bden pa mthong ba la 'jug go //
analyzed: rang byin gyis rlob pa'i rim pas kun rdzob kyi bden pa mthong ba la 'jug go //
translated: By the process of self-consecration, one enters into the vision of the superficial reality.

original: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pas 'od gsal ba la 'jug go //
analyzed: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pas 'od gsal ba la 'jug go //
translated: By the process of manifest enlightenment, one enters into the clearlight transparency.

original: zung du 'jug pa'i rim pas mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug go //
analyzed: zung du 'jug pa'i rim pas mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug go //
translated: By the process of union, one enters into the realm of non-dwelling nirvana.

original: de'i phyir sangs rgyas nyid rim gyis rnyed pa yin pas rnal 'byor pa gcig rdo rje'i bzlas pa gcig pu'am gang yang rung ste gcig gis mi 'grub po //
analyzed: de'i phyir sangs rgyas nyid rim gyis rnyed pa yin pas rnal 'byor pa gcig rdo rje'i bzlas pa gcig pu'am gang yang rung ste gcig gis mi 'grub po //
translated: Therefore, since buddhahood is attained gradually, it is not accomplished by a single yoga, a single vajra repetition, or anything else.

original: de'i phyir tsandan la sogs pa lta bu'am rin po che lta bu'i rnal 'byor pas @65a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir tsandan la sogs pa lta bu'am rin po che lta bu'i rnal 'byor pas @65a * //
translated: Therefore, the yogi/nƒ´ who is like sandalwood, etc., or like a jewel,

original: rim pa lnga char bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rim pa lnga char bsgom par bya'o //
translated: should cultivate all five stages.

original: de lta na padma lta bu la sogs pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa gcig pu'i snod yin pas rdzogs pa'i rim pa lnga po'i phyir sgom par byed ce na /
analyzed: de lta na padma lta bu la sogs pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa gcig pu'i snod yin pas rdzogs pa'i rim pa lnga po'i phyir sgom par byed ce na /
translated: If that is so, then the one who is a vessel for the creation stage alone, such as the one who is like a lotus, etc., should cultivate the five perfections.

original: smras pa / drang ba'i don du yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa gsungs pas kun gyis bsgom par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: smras pa / drang ba'i don du yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa gsungs pas kun gyis bsgom par bya ba yin no //
translated: It is said: Even in the interpretable meaning, the perfection stage is taught, so it should be cultivated by all.

original: de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gzhan du gsungs te /
analyzed: de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gzhan du gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, the BhagavƒÅn also taught it elsewhere.

original: de skad du spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma las /
analyzed: de skad du spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma las /
translated: Thus, in the Lamp of Concise Practice,

original: rdo rje slob mas gsol ba /
analyzed: rdo rje slob mas gsol ba /
translated: the vajra disciple asks:

original: bdag cag lta bu'i so so'i skye bo thog ma med pa nas phyi rol gyi dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs pa la mngon par zhen pas yod pa dang med pa dang gcig pa dang du ma dang / gnyis dang gnyis ma yin pa dang /
analyzed: bdag cag lta bu'i so so'i skye bo thog ma med pa nas phyi rol gyi dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs pa la mngon par zhen pas yod pa dang med pa dang gcig pa dang du ma dang / gnyis dang gnyis ma yin pa dang /
translated: We ordinary beings, since beginningless time, have been attached to various external things, and so we are attached to existence and non-existence, one and many, and to being and non-being.

original: yod pa ma yin med pa'ang ma yin pa rtag pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi bag chags kyi rgyus rnam par rtog pa la mngon par zhen pa la ma zhugs pa rnams kyis rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i go rims kyi ting nge 'dzin la
analyzed: yod pa ma yin med pa'ang ma yin pa rtag pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi bag chags kyi rgyus rnam par rtog pa la mngon par zhen pa la ma zhugs pa rnams kyis rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i go rims kyi ting nge 'dzin la
translated: Those who have not entered into the conception of the nature of existence and nonexistence, permanence and impermanence, and so on, due to the cause of the latent tendencies of conceptualization, should train in the samƒÅdhi of the stage of completion.

original: slob pa na /
analyzed: slob pa na /
translated: When training,

original: go rims ji lta ba bzhin du bslab par bgyi ba'am yang na bla ma'i man ngag tsam gyis de dag skad cig tsam g yis so sor snang bar bgyi /
analyzed: go rims ji lta ba bzhin du bslab par bgyi ba'am yang na bla ma'i man ngag tsam gyis de dag skad cig tsam g yis so sor snang bar bgyi /
translated: they should train in the proper sequence, or else they should be caused to appear individually in an instant by the mere oral instructions of the guru.

original: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
translated: The vajra master said:

original: rim gyis 'jug pa la slob par bya'i cig car ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rim gyis 'jug pa la slob par bya'i cig car ni ma yin no //
translated: Train in the gradual engagement, not the instantaneous.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo las gsungs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo las gsungs te /
translated: Also, the BhagavƒÅn said in the La·πÖkƒÅvatƒÅra S≈´tra:

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yang gsol ba btab pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yang gsol ba btab pa /
translated: Then the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva MahƒÅmati again supplicated the BhagavƒÅn in order to purify the continuum of appearances of his own mind:

original: bcom ldan 'das rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud cig car ram rim gyis 'jug pas sam /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud cig car ram rim gyis 'jug pas sam /
translated: BhagavƒÅn, is the continuum of one‚Äôs mind‚Äôs appearances purified all at once or gradually?

original: ji ltar rnam par dag par gyur /üîΩbcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: ji ltar rnam par dag par gyur / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: BhagavƒÅn, how is it purified?‚Äù

original: blo gros chen po rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud ni rim gyis 'jug pas rnam par dag ste cig car ni ma yin no //
analyzed: blo gros chen po rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud ni rim gyis 'jug pas rnam par dag ste cig car ni ma yin no //
translated: The BhagavƒÅn replied, ‚ÄúMahƒÅmati, the continuum of one‚Äôs mind‚Äôs appearances is purified gradually, not all at once.

original: 'di lta ste blo gros chen po shing aa mra'i 'bras bu ni rim gyis smin par 'gyur gyi cig car ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di lta ste blo gros chen po shing aa mra'i 'bras bu ni rim gyis smin par 'gyur gyi cig car ni ma yin no //
translated: MahƒÅmati, for example, the fruit of the mango ripens gradually, not all at once.

original: blo gros chen po de bzhin du sems can rnams kyi rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud kyang rim gyis rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: blo gros chen po de bzhin du sems can rnams kyi rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud kyang rim gyis rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: MahƒÅmati, likewise, the continuum of sentient beings‚Äô mind‚Äôs appearances is gradually purified,

original: cig car ni ma yin no //üîΩblo gros chen po 'di lta ste /
analyzed: cig car ni ma yin no // blo gros chen po 'di lta ste /
translated: not all at once.

original: rdza mkhan gyi snod rnams ni rim gyis byed kyi /
analyzed: rdza mkhan gyi snod rnams ni rim gyis byed kyi /
translated: MahƒÅmati, for example, a potter makes his wares gradually,

original: cig car ni ma yin no //
analyzed: cig car ni ma yin no //
translated: not all at once.

original: blo gros chen @65b po de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can rnams kyi rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud rim gyis rnam par sbyong ste /üîΩcig car ni ma yin no //
analyzed: blo gros chen @65b po de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can rnams kyi rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud rim gyis rnam par sbyong ste / cig car ni ma yin no //
translated: MahƒÅmati, in the same way, the TathƒÅgata also purifies the continuum of the appearances of the minds of sentient beings gradually, not instantaneously.

original: blo gros chen po 'di lta ste /
analyzed: blo gros chen po 'di lta ste /
translated: MahƒÅmati, it is like this:

original: sa chen po las rtsva dang shing gel ba dang / sman dang nags tshal rnams rim gyis 'jug pas skye'i cig car ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sa chen po las rtsva dang shing gel ba dang / sman dang nags tshal rnams rim gyis 'jug pas skye'i cig car ni ma yin no //
translated: from the great earth, grasses, bushes, medicinal herbs, and forests grow gradually, not instantaneously.

original: blo gros chen po de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can thams cad kyi rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud rim gyis sbyor ste cig car ni ma yin no //
analyzed: blo gros chen po de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can thams cad kyi rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud rim gyis sbyor ste cig car ni ma yin no //
translated: MahƒÅmati, in the same way, the TathƒÅgata also purifies the continuum of the appearances of the minds of all sentient beings gradually, not instantaneously.

original: blo gros chen po 'di lta ste /
analyzed: blo gros chen po 'di lta ste /
translated: MahƒÅmati, it is like this:

original: bzhad gad dang / rol mo dang / glu dang / pi wang dang / sil snyan dang / rol mo dag la mkhas pa ni rim gyis 'byung gi cig car ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bzhad gad dang / rol mo dang / glu dang / pi wang dang / sil snyan dang / rol mo dag la mkhas pa ni rim gyis 'byung gi cig car ni ma yin no //
translated: those skilled in comedy, music, singing, lute, cymbals, and musical instruments arise gradually, not instantaneously.

original: blo gros chen po de bzhin du /
analyzed: blo gros chen po de bzhin du /
translated: MahƒÅmati, in the same way,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can thams cad kyi sems snang ba'i rgyud rnams rim gyis sbyong ste cig car ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can thams cad kyi sems snang ba'i rgyud rnams rim gyis sbyong ste cig car ni ma yin no //
translated: The TathƒÅgata also gradually purifies the mind-streams of all sentient beings, but not instantaneously.

original: rim pa 'di nyid ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mdo las kyang gsal bar gsungs te /
analyzed: rim pa 'di nyid ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mdo las kyang gsal bar gsungs te /
translated: This very process is clearly taught in the S≈´tra of the Absorption of the Heroic March.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the bodhisattva great being Stable Intellect made a request:

original: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar slob na byang chub sems dpa' bslab pa thams cad la dmigs pa ma mchis par dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la slob pa lags /üîΩde skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar slob na byang chub sems dpa' bslab pa thams cad la dmigs pa ma mchis par dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la slob pa lags / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: ‚ÄúBlessed One, how is it that when training, bodhisattvas train in the absorption of the heroic march without objectifying any of the trainings?‚Äù

original: blo gros brtan pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: blo gros brtan pa 'di lta ste /
translated: When he had thus requested, the Blessed One said to the bodhisattva great being Stable Intellect, ‚ÄúStable Intellect, it is like this.

original: dper na 'phong gi slob dpon nam 'phong gi slob ma ni thog mar ba lang gi ko ba la slob par byed do //üîΩgang gi tshe ba lang gi ko ba la lobs pa de'i tshe shing leb la 'phog par byed do //
analyzed: dper na 'phong gi slob dpon nam 'phong gi slob ma ni thog mar ba lang gi ko ba la slob par byed do // gang gi tshe ba lang gi ko ba la lobs pa de'i tshe shing leb la 'phog par byed do //
translated: When he is able to hit the target the size of a palm leaf, he practices on a target the size of a myrobalan plum.

original: gang gi tshe shing leb la lobs pa de'i tshe /üîΩ'ben la 'phog par byed do //
analyzed: gang gi tshe shing leb la lobs pa de'i tshe / 'ben la 'phog par byed do //
translated: When he is able to hit the target the size of a myrobalan plum, he practices on a target the size of a barley grain.

original: gang gi tshe 'ben la lobs pa de'i tshe dbyug gu la 'phog par byed do //
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'ben la lobs pa de'i tshe dbyug gu la 'phog par byed do //
translated: When he is able to hit the target the size of a barley grain, he practices on a target the size of a sesame seed.üîΩWhen he is able to hit the target the size of a sesame seed, he practices on a target the size of a hundredth of a sesame seed.

original: gang gi tshe dbyug gu la lobs pa de'i tshe skra brgya la 'phog par byed do //
analyzed: gang gi tshe dbyug gu la lobs pa de'i tshe skra brgya la 'phog par byed do //
translated: When he is able to hit the target the size of a hundredth of a sesame seed, he practices on a target the size of a thousandth of a sesame seed.

original: gang gi tshe skra brgya la lobs pa de'i tshe skra bcu la 'phog par byed do //üîΩgang gi tshe skra bcu la lobs pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe skra brgya la lobs pa de'i tshe skra bcu la 'phog par byed do // gang gi tshe skra bcu la lobs pa de'i tshe /
translated: When he is able to hit the target the size of a thousandth of a sesame seed, he practices on a target the size of a tenth of a thousandth of a sesame seed.

original: skra gcig la 'phog par byed do //
analyzed: skra gcig la 'phog par byed do //
translated: When he is able to hit the target the size of a tenth of a thousandth of a sesame seed, he practices on a target the size of a hundredth of a thousandth of a sesame seed.

original: gang gi tshe skra gcig la lobs pa de'i tshe /üîΩsgras mtshon @66a * //
analyzed: gang gi tshe skra gcig la lobs pa de'i tshe / sgras mtshon @66a * //
translated: When he is able to hit the target the size of a hundredth of a thousandth of a sesame seed, he practices on a target the size of a thousandth of a thousandth of a sesame seed.üîΩWhen he is able to hit the target the size of a thousandth of a thousandth of a sesame seed, he practices on a target the size of a hundred thousandth of a thousandth of a sesame seed.

original: pa la 'phog par byed do //
analyzed: pa la 'phog par byed do //
translated: When he is able to hit the target the size of a hundred thousandth of a thousandth of a sesame seed, he practices on a target the size of a hundred thousandth of a hundred thousandth of a sesame seed.üîΩWhen he is able to hit the target the size of a hundred thousandth of a hundred thousandth of a sesame seed, he practices on a target the size of a hundred thousandth of a hundred thousandth of a hundred thousandth of a sesame seed.üîΩWhen he is able to hit the target the size of a hundred thousandth of a hundred thousandth of a hundred thousandth of a sesame seed, he practices on a target

original: gang gi tshe sgras mtshon pa la 'phog pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe sgras mtshon pa la 'phog pa de'i tshe /
translated: When he hits the target by the sound,

original: mi 'tshor bar 'phog par byed do //
analyzed: mi 'tshor bar 'phog par byed do //
translated: he hits without missing.

original: gang gi tshe mi mchor bar 'phog par byed pa de'i tshe 'phong bslabs pa mthar phyin pa yin te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe mi mchor bar 'phog par byed pa de'i tshe 'phong bslabs pa mthar phyin pa yin te /
translated: When he hits without missing, he has completed his training in archery.

original: de 'dod na nub mo mun pa mun nag gi nang na mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dang gang dag gi sgra grag pa de dang der lhun gyis grub cing mi 'chor ba nyid du mda' 'gro'o //
analyzed: de 'dod na nub mo mun pa mun nag gi nang na mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dang gang dag gi sgra grag pa de dang der lhun gyis grub cing mi 'chor ba nyid du mda' 'gro'o //
translated: If he wishes, at night in the darkness, wherever the sound of humans or non-humans resounds, the arrow goes spontaneously and without missing.

original: sgras mtshon pa 'phog par byed par gnas pas phyis gang du yang mi slob ste /
analyzed: sgras mtshon pa 'phog par byed par gnas pas phyis gang du yang mi slob ste /
translated: Since he is established in hitting the target by sound, he does not need to train in anything further.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sngon legs par bslabs pa'i phyir phog par bya ba thams cad de la mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sngon legs par bslabs pa'i phyir phog par bya ba thams cad de la mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
translated: Because of his previous good training, all his targets become manifest to him.

original: blo gros brtan pa de bzhin du dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas phyis chos gang la yang bslab par mi bya'o //
analyzed: blo gros brtan pa de bzhin du dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas phyis chos gang la yang bslab par mi bya'o //
translated: Sthiramati, in the same way, the bodhisattva who is established in this heroic stride meditative absorption does not need to train in anything further.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ting nge 'dzin de nyid la legs par bslabs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de nyid la legs par bslabs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
translated: Because, by properly training in that very meditative stabilization, all the qualities of a bodhisattva will be manifest.

original: yang tshul 'di nyid kyis rdo rje'i theg pa la gnas pa'i dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la slob par 'dod pas kyang rim pa 'di nyid kyis bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: yang tshul 'di nyid kyis rdo rje'i theg pa la gnas pa'i dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la slob par 'dod pas kyang rim pa 'di nyid kyis bslab par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, by this very method, one who wishes to train in the heroic progress meditative stabilization abiding in the Vajra Vehicle should also train by this very method.

original: de'i rim pa 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i rim pa 'di yin te /
translated: This is the process:

original: thog ma nyid du sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i bsam pa la slob po //
analyzed: thog ma nyid du sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i bsam pa la slob po //
translated: First, one trains in the thought of the Buddha Vehicle.

original: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i bsam pa la lobs par gyur pa de'i tshe theg pa sar pa la dran pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la slob bo //
analyzed: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i bsam pa la lobs par gyur pa de'i tshe theg pa sar pa la dran pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la slob bo //
translated: When one has become trained in the thought of the Buddha Vehicle, then one trains in the beginner‚Äôs vehicle in the one-pointed meditative stabilization.

original: gang gi tshe theg pa sar pa la dran pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la lobs pa de'i tshe rtog pa'i rnal 'byor la slob bo //
analyzed: gang gi tshe theg pa sar pa la dran pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la lobs pa de'i tshe rtog pa'i rnal 'byor la slob bo //
translated: When one has become trained in the beginner‚Äôs vehicle in the one-pointed meditative stabilization, then one trains in the yoga of imagination.

original: gang gi tshe rtog pa'i rnal 'byor la lobs pa de'i tshe las dang po pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe rtog pa'i rnal 'byor la lobs pa de'i tshe las dang po pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: When one is skilled in the yoga of imagination, then one is well-established in the concentration of the beginner.

original: gang gi tshe las dang po pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa de'i tshe rigs brgya'i dbye ba la 'jug go //
analyzed: gang gi tshe las dang po pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa de'i tshe rigs brgya'i dbye ba la 'jug go //
translated: When one is established in the concentration of the beginner, then one enters into the hundred families.

original: gang gi tshe rigs brgya'i dbye bas lus rnam par dben pa shes pa de'i tshe sku rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe rigs brgya'i dbye bas lus rnam par dben pa shes pa de'i tshe sku rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: When one knows the isolation of the body by means of the hundred families, then one is established in the concentration of the vajra body.

original: lus rnam par dben pa la gnas nas a'a li k'a li'i sgo nas ngag rnam par dben pa la 'jug go //
analyzed: lus rnam par dben pa la gnas nas a'a li k'a li'i sgo nas ngag rnam par dben pa la 'jug go //
translated: Having been established in the isolation of the body, one enters into the isolation of speech by means of the ƒÅlikƒÅli.

original: gang gi tshe rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim gyis srog dang rtsol ba shes par 'gyur @66b pa de'i tshe gsung gi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gsal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim gyis srog dang rtsol ba shes par 'gyur @66b pa de'i tshe gsung gi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gsal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When one knows the life-force and exertion by means of the stage of vajra repetition, then the concentration of the vajra speech becomes clear.

original: ngag rnam par dben pa la gnas nas rang bzhin gyis snang ba'i rim gyis sems kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ngag rnam par dben pa la gnas nas rang bzhin gyis snang ba'i rim gyis sems kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having been established in the isolation of speech, one enters into the concentration of mind by means of the stage of natural appearance.

original: sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa la gnas nas sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyi kun rdzob kyi bden pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa la gnas nas sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyi kun rdzob kyi bden pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having abided in the correct knowledge of the mind as it is, one enters into the conventional truth of the twelve examples of illusion.

original: gang gi tshe sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur ba thob bo //
analyzed: gang gi tshe sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur ba thob bo //
translated: When one enters into the samƒÅdhi of illusion, at that time one obtains the empowerment of the buddhas.

original: gang gi tshe dbang bskur ba thob pa de'i tshe sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas stong pa chen po bco brgyad kyi rim pas don dam pa'i bden pa la 'jug go //
analyzed: gang gi tshe dbang bskur ba thob pa de'i tshe sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas stong pa chen po bco brgyad kyi rim pas don dam pa'i bden pa la 'jug go //
translated: When one obtains the empowerment, at that time, having abided in the samƒÅdhi of illusion, one enters into the ultimate truth by means of the sequence of the eighteen great emptinesses.

original: gang gi tshe ril por 'dzin pa dang rjes su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'jug pa de'i tshe nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe ril por 'dzin pa dang rjes su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'jug pa de'i tshe nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: When one enters into the limit of reality by means of the samƒÅdhi of grasping the whole and grasping the subsequent, at that time all afflictions will be purified.

original: gang gi tshe ye shes kyi rim gyis ldang ba'i phyir rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i bden pa gnyis la gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor pas bdag nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la slob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe ye shes kyi rim gyis ldang ba'i phyir rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i bden pa gnyis la gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor pas bdag nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la slob par 'gyur ro //
translated: When, by the stages of wisdom, one rises, and the yogin of the non-duality of the two truths, which are naturally radiant, has fully awakened to reality, then one trains in the perfection of samadhi.

original: gang gi tshe rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas ni yang chos gang la yang mi slob bo //
analyzed: gang gi tshe rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas ni yang chos gang la yang mi slob bo //
translated: When the yogin enters into the perfection of samadhi, he does not train in any dharma.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sngon legs par bslabs pa'i phyir de'i sngon gyi 'phen shugs kyi stobs kyis mngon sum du 'gyur ro zhe'o //
analyzed: sngon legs par bslabs pa'i phyir de'i sngon gyi 'phen shugs kyi stobs kyis mngon sum du 'gyur ro zhe'o //
translated: Because of previous good training, it is by the power of the previous impetus that one realizes.

original: de'i phyir na rim gyis thob par bya ba rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid /
analyzed: de'i phyir na rim gyis thob par bya ba rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid /
translated: Therefore, the Great Vajradhara, who is to be attained by stages,

original: rim pa lnga bsgom pas thob pa yin zhes rnal 'byor pa gcig gis thams cad bsgom mo //
analyzed: rim pa lnga bsgom pas thob pa yin zhes rnal 'byor pa gcig gis thams cad bsgom mo //
translated: is attained by the meditation on the five stages. Thus, one yogin meditates on everything.

original: gang yang rim pa re re la 'od gsal ba bshad pa de ni de kho na nyid kyis kun khyab bo zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir yin gyi /
analyzed: gang yang rim pa re re la 'od gsal ba bshad pa de ni de kho na nyid kyis kun khyab bo zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir yin gyi /
translated: Also, the explanation of clear light in each stage is in order to teach that reality pervades all.

original: de nyid du yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid du yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin no //
translated: But it is not fully complete in those stages.

original: bya ba byas pa nyid ni zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la'o //
analyzed: bya ba byas pa nyid ni zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la'o //
translated: The state of having done what was to be done is in the meditative stabilization of union.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: 'di ni rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes //
analyzed: 'di ni rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes //
translated: This is called the yoga of completion,

original: rdo rje 'chang ba chen po nyid //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang ba chen po nyid //
translated: the state of Great Vajradhara,

original: rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa //
translated: endowed with the supreme of all aspects,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'ang de nas 'gyur //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'ang de nas 'gyur //
translated: and omniscience comes from that.

original: zhes dang / de bzhin du yang gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes dang / de bzhin du yang gsungs te /
translated: And also:

original: zung 'jug gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas slar yang gang la mi bslab po zhes 'byung ngo //üîΩde'i phyir rim @67a * //
analyzed: zung 'jug gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas slar yang gang la mi bslab po zhes 'byung ngo // de'i phyir rim @67a * //
translated: The yogi/nƒ´ abiding in the meditative stabilization of union does not train in anything else.

original: pa lnga la brten nas rnal 'byor pa gcig gis 'bras bu'i gnas skabs su dngos grub thob pa yin no //
analyzed: pa lnga la brten nas rnal 'byor pa gcig gis 'bras bu'i gnas skabs su dngos grub thob pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, in dependence on the five stages, a single yogi/nƒ´ attains power in the state of the result.

original: le'u bco brgyad pa'i brjod par bya ba'i rim pa gnyis sgom pa po rnal 'byor pa gcig gis thob par bya ba rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang bzhin no //
analyzed: le'u bco brgyad pa'i brjod par bya ba'i rim pa gnyis sgom pa po rnal 'byor pa gcig gis thob par bya ba rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang bzhin no //
translated: The two stages of the eighteen chapters are to be attained by a single yogin, just like the state of Vajradhara.

original: rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi le'u bco brgyad la rnal 'byor pas bco brgyad so sor sgom pa po ma bstan to //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi le'u bco brgyad la rnal 'byor pas bco brgyad so sor sgom pa po ma bstan to //
translated: The eighteen chapters of the root tantra do not teach that the yogin should meditate on the eighteen separately.

original: 'on kyang gcig pu nyid do //
analyzed: 'on kyang gcig pu nyid do //
translated: However, they are one.

original: rim pa gnyis ma gtogs par gzhan ma gsungs so //
analyzed: rim pa gnyis ma gtogs par gzhan ma gsungs so //
translated: Apart from the two stages, nothing else is taught.

original: de dag gi sgom pa po ni gcig yin zhes sngon du bshad do //
analyzed: de dag gi sgom pa po ni gcig yin zhes sngon du bshad do //
translated: And the meditator on them is one, as explained above.

original: gang zag gi dbye ba ni bshad pa'i dbye bas bshad du rung ba'o ;
analyzed: gang zag gi dbye ba ni bshad pa'i dbye bas bshad du rung ba'o ;
translated: The classification of persons is to be explained by the classification of the teachings.

original: / thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas rnams kyis sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbye bas sems can gyi rgyud kyi khyad par shes nas de dang rjes su mthun par bstan par mdzad do //
analyzed: / thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas rnams kyis sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbye bas sems can gyi rgyud kyi khyad par shes nas de dang rjes su mthun par bstan par mdzad do //
translated: The Blessed Buddhas, who are endowed with skill in means, know the differences in the mind-streams of sentient beings by the classification of their intentions and teach in accordance with them.

original: 'bras bu la dgongs te dbye ba ma bstan te /
analyzed: 'bras bu la dgongs te dbye ba ma bstan te /
translated: The classification is not taught with regard to the result.

original: de gcig gi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gcig gi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they have the same nature.

original: lam ni tha dad pa kho na ste /
analyzed: lam ni tha dad pa kho na ste /
translated: The paths are definitely different,

original: lam gyi 'bras bur gyur pa'i de kho na nyid kyi dbye ba sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: lam gyi 'bras bur gyur pa'i de kho na nyid kyi dbye ba sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: because the classification of reality, which is the result of the path, is not established by the path,

original: lam du mas thob par bya ba grong khyer chen po bzhin no //
analyzed: lam du mas thob par bya ba grong khyer chen po bzhin no //
translated: just as a great city is reached by many paths.

original: mos pa'i bye brag gi de kho na nyid gcig pu yang nyan pa pos bye brag tu gzung ngo //
analyzed: mos pa'i bye brag gi de kho na nyid gcig pu yang nyan pa pos bye brag tu gzung ngo //
translated: The reality that is the specific object of faith is also apprehended by the listener as a diversity.

original: dper na nyan thos rnams kyis 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa'i sgo nas gzung bar byed de /
analyzed: dper na nyan thos rnams kyis 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa'i sgo nas gzung bar byed de /
translated: For example, the sravakas apprehend it through the meditative attainment of cessation.

original: mdo sde pa rnams kyis de nyid rjes su dpag pa'i phyi'i don yod par so sor snang ba'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: mdo sde pa rnams kyis de nyid rjes su dpag pa'i phyi'i don yod par so sor snang ba'i sgo nas so //
translated: The Sautrantikas apprehend it through the appearance of external objects that are inferred from it.

original: rnam pa dang bcas pa'i rnam rig smra ba rnams kyis shes pa'i rnam pa phyi'i don yod pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: rnam pa dang bcas pa'i rnam rig smra ba rnams kyis shes pa'i rnam pa phyi'i don yod pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: The Vijfiaptimatra theorists who believe that consciousness has aspects apprehend it through the aspect of consciousness that is the external object.

original: rnam pa med pa'i rnam rig smra ba pos phyi'i dngos po las nges par grol ba dri ma med pa mtha' las 'das pa'i nam mkha' gcig pu dang mtshungs pa'i rnam par rig pa gcig pu yod pa'i sgo na gzung ngo //
analyzed: rnam pa med pa'i rnam rig smra ba pos phyi'i dngos po las nges par grol ba dri ma med pa mtha' las 'das pa'i nam mkha' gcig pu dang mtshungs pa'i rnam par rig pa gcig pu yod pa'i sgo na gzung ngo //
translated: The Proponents of Cognition Without Images hold that it is apprehended in terms of a single cognition that is free from external entities, stainless, and similar to the sole, transcendent space.üîΩSome hold that it is apprehended in terms of the mere appearance of individual entities, which are empty of nature by way of the emptiness of the Middle Way free from the elaborations of apprehended and apprehender.

original: la la yang dbu ma pa rnams kyis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa las grol ba rab tu zhi zhing spros pa med pa 'ba' zhig tu stong pa nyid kyis ngo bo nyid dngos po so sor snang ba tsam gyi sgo nas gzung ba dang / bya ba'i rgyud kyi rnal 'byor pas lha'i rnam pa sgom pa tsam gyi sgo nas gzung ba dang /üîΩspyod pa'i rgyud kyi rnal 'byor pas dngos grub dang ting @67b nge 'dzin dang cho 'phrul dang ldan pa /
analyzed: la la yang dbu ma pa rnams kyis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa las grol ba rab tu zhi zhing spros pa med pa 'ba' zhig tu stong pa nyid kyis ngo bo nyid dngos po so sor snang ba tsam gyi sgo nas gzung ba dang / bya ba'i rgyud kyi rnal 'byor pas lha'i rnam pa sgom pa tsam gyi sgo nas gzung ba dang / spyod pa'i rgyud kyi rnal 'byor pas dngos grub dang ting @67b nge 'dzin dang cho 'phrul dang ldan pa /
translated: Some hold that it is apprehended in terms of the mere meditation on the form of the deity by the yogis of Action Tantra.

original: sngags kyi sku bsgom pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: sngags kyi sku bsgom pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: Some hold that it is apprehended in terms of the meditation on the mantra body endowed with powers, samƒÅdhis, and miracles by the yogis of Performance Tantra.

original: rnam 'byor gyi rgyud gtsor gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pas sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs pa gtsor gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa'i bsgom pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: rnam 'byor gyi rgyud gtsor gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pas sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs pa gtsor gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa'i bsgom pa'i rim pas so //
translated: The yogi/nƒ´ of the yoga tantra, who is mainly a yogi/nƒ´ of mantra and mudrƒÅ, should hold reality by the stage of meditation of the great ma·πá·∏çala of the vajra realm, and so on.

original: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi rnal 'byor pas rim pa gnyis kyis so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi rnal 'byor pas rim pa gnyis kyis so //
translated: The yogi/nƒ´ of the great yoga tantra should hold reality by the two stages.

original: de la bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pas ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi sgo nas de kho na nyid gzung ba'o //
analyzed: de la bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pas ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi sgo nas de kho na nyid gzung ba'o //
translated: Therein, the yogi/nƒ´ of the creation stage should hold reality by way of the three meditative stabilizations.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pas phra mo'i rnal 'byor gzung ba'i sgo nas de kho na nyid gzung ba'o //üîΩla las kyang thig le'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i rim pas 'dod do //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pas phra mo'i rnal 'byor gzung ba'i sgo nas de kho na nyid gzung ba'o // la las kyang thig le'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i rim pas 'dod do //
translated: The yogi/nƒ´ of the completion stage should hold reality by way of apprehending reality through the yoga of the subtle.üîΩSome assert that it is by the stage of meditation of the yoga of the drop.

original: la las kyang rtsa kun tu rgyu ba'i rtsa'i bsgom pas so //
analyzed: la las kyang rtsa kun tu rgyu ba'i rtsa'i bsgom pas so //
translated: Some assert that it is by the meditation of the movement of the nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s.

original: la las kyang dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas gzung ngo //
analyzed: la las kyang dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas gzung ngo //
translated: Some assert that it is apprehended by way of the commitment ma·πá·∏çala.

original: la las kyang de'i nang du gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la gsang ba'i dbang gis so //
analyzed: la las kyang de'i nang du gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la gsang ba'i dbang gis so //
translated: Some also by means of the secret consecration in the secret mandala.

original: gzhan dag gis kyang byang chub kyi sems gzung ba gcig pus so //
analyzed: gzhan dag gis kyang byang chub kyi sems gzung ba gcig pus so //
translated: Others again by the mere retention of the Thought of Enlightenment.

original: gzhan yang de nyid steng du bzlog pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: gzhan yang de nyid steng du bzlog pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: And still others by the reversal of that very [retention] upward.

original: la las kyang yul dang dbang po'i longs spyod cing so sor sdud pa'i bsgom pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: la las kyang yul dang dbang po'i longs spyod cing so sor sdud pa'i bsgom pa'i rim pas so //
translated: Some also by the process of meditation on the enjoyment of the objects and faculties and on their individual withdrawal.

original: gzhan dag gis kyang de'i rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin rtog pa dang dpyod pa la sogs pa rnam pa lnga'i bsam gtan gyi rim pas so //
analyzed: gzhan dag gis kyang de'i rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin rtog pa dang dpyod pa la sogs pa rnam pa lnga'i bsam gtan gyi rim pas so //
translated: Others again by the process of the meditation of the five members, such as investigation, analysis, etc., which is the nature of the five Tathagatas, the pure essence of that [retention].

original: kha cig gis kyang steng dang 'og tu rgyu ba'i rlung gsum gyi bdag nyid srog dang rtsol ba'i rlung gi sgo nas de kho na nyid nges par gzung ngo //
analyzed: kha cig gis kyang steng dang 'og tu rgyu ba'i rlung gsum gyi bdag nyid srog dang rtsol ba'i rlung gi sgo nas de kho na nyid nges par gzung ngo //
translated: And some also by means of the life-breath and the exertion-breath, which are the nature of the three breaths moving upward and downward, apprehend the reality.

original: de bzhin du gzhan rnams kyis kyang sna gsum gyi rtse mor 'dzin par gyur pa rlung dang sngags dang byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le 'dzin pas so //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan rnams kyis kyang sna gsum gyi rtse mor 'dzin par gyur pa rlung dang sngags dang byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le 'dzin pas so //
translated: Likewise, others hold the three noses, the tip of the nose, by holding the vital wind, mantra, and the drop of bodhicitta.

original: kha cig gis kyang sprul pa mtha' yas pa spro bas nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su bkang zhing rjes su dran pa'i yan lag bsgom pas so //
analyzed: kha cig gis kyang sprul pa mtha' yas pa spro bas nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su bkang zhing rjes su dran pa'i yan lag bsgom pas so //
translated: Some, by emanating infinite emanations, fill the realm of space, by cultivating the branch of recollection.

original: la las kyang dngos po thams cad nye bar sdud cing gcig dang du ma la sogs pa spangs pa'i gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pas so //
analyzed: la las kyang dngos po thams cad nye bar sdud cing gcig dang du ma la sogs pa spangs pa'i gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pas so //
translated: Some, by gathering all things, by the process of nondual samƒÅdhi, which is free from one and many, and so on.

original: la la sngags kyi de kho na nyid dam rlung gi de kho na nyid bsgom pas so //
analyzed: la la sngags kyi de kho na nyid dam rlung gi de kho na nyid bsgom pas so //
translated: Some, by cultivating the reality of mantra or the reality of vital wind.

original: la las kyang sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: la las kyang sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs pa'i rim pas so //
translated: Some, by the process of mantra, seal, and so on.

original: kha cig gis kyang de las skyes pa'i @68a * //
analyzed: kha cig gis kyang de las skyes pa'i @68a * //
translated: Some, by the body of mantra born from that.

original: sngags kyi sku dang sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis so //
analyzed: sngags kyi sku dang sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis so //
translated: Some, by the illusion-like samƒÅdhi.

original: gzhan dag gis kyang snang ba thob pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis lha'i skur bsgoms pas so //
analyzed: gzhan dag gis kyang snang ba thob pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis lha'i skur bsgoms pas so //
translated: Others, by the yoga of attaining the light, and so on, meditate on the body of the deity.

original: la las kyang phyag rgya dang ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i rim pas 'od gsal ba la 'jug pas so //
analyzed: la las kyang phyag rgya dang ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i rim pas 'od gsal ba la 'jug pas so //
translated: And others, by the stage of meditation on the seal and concentration, enter into clear light.

original: gzhan yang srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa ro gcig pa gnyis su med pa zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo nas de kho na nyid sgom par byed do //
analyzed: gzhan yang srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa ro gcig pa gnyis su med pa zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo nas de kho na nyid sgom par byed do //
translated: Moreover, they meditate on reality by the door of concentration on the nondual unity of existence and nirvƒÅ·πáa, which is of one taste.

original: de kho na nyid gcig yin pa'i phyir lam gyi bye brag du ma la skyon med do //
analyzed: de kho na nyid gcig yin pa'i phyir lam gyi bye brag du ma la skyon med do //
translated: Since reality is one, there is no fault in the many different paths.

original: gzhi'i bye brag gi dbang gis bye brag ltar snang ba ste char bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhi'i bye brag gi dbang gis bye brag ltar snang ba ste char bzhin no //
translated: It is like the variety of rain, due to the power of the variety of the ground.

original: dper na char ba'i dus su chu 'dzin gyi tshogs kyi nang nas 'byung ba'i char ba rma byas 'thung pa na bdud rtsi nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dper na char ba'i dus su chu 'dzin gyi tshogs kyi nang nas 'byung ba'i char ba rma byas 'thung pa na bdud rtsi nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: For example, during the rainy season, the rain that comes from the mass of clouds becomes nectar when drunk by a peacock.

original: de nyid sbrul gyis 'thung ba na dug tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid sbrul gyis 'thung ba na dug tu 'gyur ro //
translated: That same rain becomes poison when drunk by a snake.

original: bu ram gyi shing la sogs pa de nyid mngar ba'i ro ru 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bu ram gyi shing la sogs pa de nyid mngar ba'i ro ru 'gyur ro //
translated: The sugarcane itself becomes the sweet taste.üîΩThe neem tree itself becomes the bitter taste.

original: nim pa'i shing la de nyid kha ba'i ro ru 'gyur ro zhes de kho na nyid la de bzhin du bye brag tu med do //
analyzed: nim pa'i shing la de nyid kha ba'i ro ru 'gyur ro zhes de kho na nyid la de bzhin du bye brag tu med do //
translated: In reality, there is no difference in this way.

original: 'di ltar dpyad par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar dpyad par bya ste /
translated: This should be analyzed.

original: gal te dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i phyogs su rim pa lnga ma gtogs par gzhan rdzogs pa'i rim pa med pa yin na de ci'i phyir phra mo'i rnal 'byor la sogs pa yan lag drug pa'i rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis de dang de ru gsungs she na
analyzed: gal te dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i phyogs su rim pa lnga ma gtogs par gzhan rdzogs pa'i rim pa med pa yin na de ci'i phyir phra mo'i rnal 'byor la sogs pa yan lag drug pa'i rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis de dang de ru gsungs she na
translated: If, in the glorious Guhyasamaja, there is no completion stage other than the five stages, why did the Bhagavan teach the yoga of subtle [vajra recitation] and so forth, the six-branched yoga, here and there?

original: / smras pa /
analyzed: / smras pa /
translated: It is said:

original: de dag gi nang du song bas rdzogs pa'i rim pa de las gzhan med do //
analyzed: de dag gi nang du song bas rdzogs pa'i rim pa de las gzhan med do //
translated: Since they are included in that, there is no completion stage other than that.

original: de la phra mo'i rnal 'byor dang thig le'i rnal 'byor dag ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa la bsdus so //
analyzed: de la phra mo'i rnal 'byor dang thig le'i rnal 'byor dag ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa la bsdus so //
translated: Among them, the yoga of subtle [vajra recitation] and the yoga of the drop are included in the stage of vajra recitation.

original: rtsa'i kun tu spyod pa dang dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang de'i nang du gsang ba'i dbang sems la dmigs pa thob pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: rtsa'i kun tu spyod pa dang dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang de'i nang du gsang ba'i dbang sems la dmigs pa thob pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: The practice of the channels and the mandala of commitments and the secret initiation within it are included in the stage of achieving the mind.

original: byang chub sems 'dzin pa ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa la'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems 'dzin pa ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa la'o //
translated: The retention of the bodhicitta is in the stage of manifest enlightenment.

original: de steng du bzlog pa ni de nyid du 'dus so //
analyzed: de steng du bzlog pa ni de nyid du 'dus so //
translated: The reversal on top of that is included in that very stage.

original: so sor sdud pa dang bsam gtan dag ni sems rnam par dag pa la'o //
analyzed: so sor sdud pa dang bsam gtan dag ni sems rnam par dag pa la'o //
translated: The withdrawal and meditative concentration are in the stage of purifying the mind.

original: srog dang rtsol ba dag gis rdo rje bzlas pa mtshon pa dang / 'dzin pa ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pas mtshon no //
analyzed: srog dang rtsol ba dag gis rdo rje bzlas pa mtshon pa dang / 'dzin pa ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pas mtshon no //
translated: The vajra repetition by means of the vital energy control and the retention by means of the stage of manifest enlightenment.üîΩThe recollection is in the stage of self-consecration, and the branch of meditative concentration is included in the stage of union.

original: rjes su dran pas ni bdag byin gyis rlob pa'i rim pa mtshon pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi yan lag ni zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa la bsdus so zhes rim pa lnga'i bdag nyid kho na rdzogs @68b pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su dran pas ni bdag byin gyis rlob pa'i rim pa mtshon pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi yan lag ni zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa la bsdus so zhes rim pa lnga'i bdag nyid kho na rdzogs @68b pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: Thus the perfection stage is of the nature of the five stages alone.

original: de la 'di ltar dpyad pa yin te /
analyzed: de la 'di ltar dpyad pa yin te /
translated: Here is the analysis of that.

original: ci rim pa 'di dag bzhi'am drug la sogs par mi 'gyur zhing lnga kho nar bshad ce na zhes grangs la log par rtog pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir smras pa /
analyzed: ci rim pa 'di dag bzhi'am drug la sogs par mi 'gyur zhing lnga kho nar bshad ce na zhes grangs la log par rtog pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir smras pa /
translated: One might ask, Why are these stages not four or six, and so on, but explained as only five? In order to dispel such a misconception about the number, it is said:

original: 'dir ni rnal 'byor pas tha mal pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid rnam par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: 'dir ni rnal 'byor pas tha mal pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid rnam par bya ba yin te /
translated: Here, the yogi/nƒ´ acts to purify the ordinary body, speech, and mind.

original: de'i don du bskyed pa'i rim pas lus rnam par dag pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dang po rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pas ngag rnam par dag pa dang / thams cad rnam par dag pas sems rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: de'i don du bskyed pa'i rim pas lus rnam par dag pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dang po rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pas ngag rnam par dag pa dang / thams cad rnam par dag pas sems rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: For that purpose, there is the purification of the body by the creation stage, the purification of speech by the first stage of vajra repetition of the completion stage, and the purification of the mind by the stage of the purification of everything.

original: lus dang ngag dang yid rnam par dag pa na sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rang byin gyis rlob pa'o //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang yid rnam par dag pa na sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rang byin gyis rlob pa'o //
translated: When the body, speech, and mind are purified, there is the self-consecration by the illusion-like meditative stabilization in order to perform the welfare of sentient beings.

original: de la mngon par zhen pa yongs su spong ba'i phyir don dam pa'i bden pa'i ngo bo mngon par byang chub pa'o //
analyzed: de la mngon par zhen pa yongs su spong ba'i phyir don dam pa'i bden pa'i ngo bo mngon par byang chub pa'o //
translated: For the purpose of abandoning attachment to that, there is the manifest enlightenment of the entity of the ultimate truth.

original: de ltar na chad par thal bar 'gyur bas de yongs su spong ba'i phyir bden pa gnyis gnyis su byar med pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa rdo rje'i sku zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs can rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin
analyzed: de ltar na chad par thal bar 'gyur bas de yongs su spong ba'i phyir bden pa gnyis gnyis su byar med pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa rdo rje'i sku zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs can rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin
translated: Thus, in order to completely avoid the consequence of nihilism, the vajra body, which is synonymous with the truth of the supreme aspect of all aspects, which is not divided into two truths, is the nature of various jewels.üîΩ

original: gzhal yas khang pa'i nang du gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po nyid du bzhugs pa /
analyzed: gzhal yas khang pa'i nang du gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po nyid du bzhugs pa /
translated: In order to completely avoid the consequence of nihilism, the one who is characterized by the indivisibility of the two truths, endowed with the most sublime of all aspects, is called the ‚ÄúvajrakƒÅya,‚Äù which is a synonym for the nature of various jewels that exists within the immeasurable mansion as the lord of the ma·πá·∏çala.

original: sar zhing sar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo spros pas nam mkha'i gtos ma lus par khyab pa dus thams cad du sems can ma lus pa sgrol ba la brtson pa /
analyzed: sar zhing sar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo spros pas nam mkha'i gtos ma lus par khyab pa dus thams cad du sems can ma lus pa sgrol ba la brtson pa /
translated: The ma·πá·∏çala of the sa·πÉbhogakƒÅya pervades the entire realm of space with emanations, and is always dedicated to liberating all sentient beings without exception.

original: khyab 'jug dang lha chen po dang tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i mchog rnams kyis zhabs kyi padma la phyag byas pa /
analyzed: khyab 'jug dang lha chen po dang tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i mchog rnams kyis zhabs kyi padma la phyag byas pa /
translated: The supreme gods, such as Vi·π£·πáu, Mahe≈õvara, BrahmƒÅ, ≈öakra, and so on, pay homage at his lotus feet.

original: yid bzhin nor bu dang dpag bsam shing dang / bum pa bzang po ltar re ba thams cad skong bar byed pa zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la dmigs nas rnal 'byor pas gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu dang dpag bsam shing dang / bum pa bzang po ltar re ba thams cad skong bar byed pa zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la dmigs nas rnal 'byor pas gnas par bya'o //
translated: The yogin should abide in the meditative concentration of union, which fulfills all hopes like a wish-fulfilling gem, a wish-granting tree, or an excellent vase.

original: de bas na kun tu 'od kyi sa bcu gnyis pa la gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na kun tu 'od kyi sa bcu gnyis pa la gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, he abides on the twelfth stage, the stage of Universal Radiance.

original: de'i 'og tu bslab par bya ba med pas de nyid sa bcu gsum par bshad do //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu bslab par bya ba med pas de nyid sa bcu gsum par bshad do //
translated: After that, since there is nothing more to learn, that is explained as the thirteenth stage.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: zung 'jug ting 'dzin la gnas nas //
analyzed: zung 'jug ting 'dzin la gnas nas //
translated: Abiding in the meditative concentration of union,

original: slar zhing gang la'ang mi slob po //üîΩzhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: slar zhing gang la'ang mi slob po // zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: he does not learn anything further.

original: de ltar rim pa de dag gi rnal 'byor pas gal te gang la yang mi slob pa'i dbang gis bya ba byas pa byed pa rdzogs pas rim pa drug pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: de ltar rim pa de dag gi rnal 'byor pas gal te gang la yang mi slob pa'i dbang gis bya ba byas pa byed pa rdzogs pas rim pa drug pa gang yang med do //
translated: Thus, if the yogin of those stages, by virtue of not learning anything further, has completed the performance of what is to be done, then there is no sixth stage.

original: @69a * // zhes grangs lhag pa bsal to //
analyzed: @69a * // zhes grangs lhag pa bsal to //
translated: Thus, the excess of number is eliminated.

original: nyung ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: nyung ba yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it deficient.

original: lnga med pas gzhan dang rang gi don med pa'i phyir zhes grangs la log par rtog pa can gyi lan no //
analyzed: lnga med pas gzhan dang rang gi don med pa'i phyir zhes grangs la log par rtog pa can gyi lan no //
translated: The reply to the objection that the five perfections are not mentioned is that the other four perfections are included in the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'dir yang 'di ltar dpyad par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir yang 'di ltar dpyad par bya ste /
translated: Here, one should analyze as follows:

original: ting nge 'dzin de rnams kyi tshad ma mngon sum mam rjes su dpag pa yod ce na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de rnams kyi tshad ma mngon sum mam rjes su dpag pa yod ce na /
translated: Is the measure of those meditative concentrations direct perception or inference?

original: de la re zhig mngon sum ni mi 'thad de /
analyzed: de la re zhig mngon sum ni mi 'thad de /
translated: First, direct perception is not tenable,

original: rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is nonconceptual.

original: mngon sum rtog pa dang bral zhing ma 'khrul pa yin zhes bshad pas so //
analyzed: mngon sum rtog pa dang bral zhing ma 'khrul pa yin zhes bshad pas so //
translated: It is explained that direct perception is free from conceptuality and non-erroneous.

original: rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa'i bsgom pa'i rim pas de kho na nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa'i bsgom pa'i rim pas de kho na nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the conception of reality arises through the stages of cultivation such as vajra repetition.

original: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa la ni sngags dang / rlung gi de kho na nyid yid la byed pa ji srid ma byas pa de srid rnam pa bcu gcig gis rdo rje bzlas pa ji ltar bsgom /
analyzed: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa la ni sngags dang / rlung gi de kho na nyid yid la byed pa ji srid ma byas pa de srid rnam pa bcu gcig gis rdo rje bzlas pa ji ltar bsgom /
translated: In the stage of vajra repetition, as long as one does not attend to the reality of mantra and wind, how can one cultivate vajra repetition with the eleven aspects?

original: sems la dmigs pa thob pa la ni yi ge gsum gyi bdag nyid sngags chos 'byung ba'i 'khor lo'i nang du thig le dang tsheg drag gi nang du 'jug pa dang / phyag rgya dang lhan cig tu snang ba la sogs pa'i ye shes rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: sems la dmigs pa thob pa la ni yi ge gsum gyi bdag nyid sngags chos 'byung ba'i 'khor lo'i nang du thig le dang tsheg drag gi nang du 'jug pa dang / phyag rgya dang lhan cig tu snang ba la sogs pa'i ye shes rtogs par byed do //
translated: In the attainment of the meditative concentration of the mind, one realizes the pristine wisdom of the three syllables, the mantra, entering into the wheel of the source of phenomena, into the bindu and the visarga, and of the appearance together with the seal, and so forth.

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la yang sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyi rnam par rtog pa skye'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la yang sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyi rnam par rtog pa skye'o //
translated: In the meditative concentration of the illusion-like, one generates the concepts of the twelve examples of illusion.

original: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa la phyag rgya dang rdo rje dang padma snyoms par zhugs pa'i yid la byed pa dang / chags pa dang chags pa dang bral ba dang / chags pa bar ma'i rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa la phyag rgya dang rdo rje dang padma snyoms par zhugs pa'i yid la byed pa dang / chags pa dang chags pa dang bral ba dang / chags pa bar ma'i rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa 'byung ngo //
translated: In the stage of manifest enlightenment, one generates the mental attentions of the seal, the vajra, and the lotus entering into union, and the mental attentions of the concepts of passion, separation from passion, and middling passion.

original: zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang bden pa gnyis gnyis su med pa'i rtog pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zung du 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang bden pa gnyis gnyis su med pa'i rtog pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the meditative concentration of union, one generates the concept of the non-duality of the two truths.

original: de ltar rim pa gnyis bsgom pa ni rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir mngon sum du mi srid do //
analyzed: de ltar rim pa gnyis bsgom pa ni rtog pa dang bcas pa'i phyir mngon sum du mi srid do //
translated: Thus, since the cultivation of the two stages is conceptual, it is impossible to be direct perception.

original: nges pa'i shes pas 'grub po zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: nges pa'i shes pas 'grub po zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If you say that it is established by a definitive cognition, that is not so.

original: nges pa'i shes pa ni rtog pa med pa'i mngon sum las phyis 'byung ba yin gyi dang po ni ma yin no //
analyzed: nges pa'i shes pa ni rtog pa med pa'i mngon sum las phyis 'byung ba yin gyi dang po ni ma yin no //
translated: A definitive cognition arises later from nonconceptual direct perception, but not at first.

original: rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa ni rnam par rtog pa la rtog pa med pa'i mngon sum 'jug par mi 'gyur zhes ci la brten te /
analyzed: rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa ni rnam par rtog pa la rtog pa med pa'i mngon sum 'jug par mi 'gyur zhes ci la brten te /
translated: What is the basis for saying that in vajra repetition and so on, conceptual direct perception does not occur?

original: nges pa'i shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: nges pa'i shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: A definitive cognition will arise.

original: rgyun du gnas pa'i shes pa rnams kyis tshad ma nyid med de /
analyzed: rgyun du gnas pa'i shes pa rnams kyis tshad ma nyid med de /
translated: Cognitions that remain continuously are not valid cognitions.

original: don gyi yul can ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don gyi yul can ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they do not have an object.

original: rang dbang gi rtog pa yang nges pa med de /
analyzed: rang dbang gi rtog pa yang nges pa med de /
translated: Also, independent concepts are not definitive.

original: de tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de tshad ma ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are not valid cognitions.

original: tshad ma med pa ni bden pa'i @69b dngos po la brten te mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad ma med pa ni bden pa'i @69b dngos po la brten te mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Without valid cognitions, one does not rely on real things.

original: slob dpon gyis bstan pa'i rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa'i rim pa rnams rna ba'i dbang gis gzung bar bya ba yin pas dbang po'i mngon sum nges pa'i shes pa dang bcas pas nges par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis bstan pa'i rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa'i rim pa rnams rna ba'i dbang gis gzung bar bya ba yin pas dbang po'i mngon sum nges pa'i shes pa dang bcas pas nges par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Since the stages of vajra repetition and so on taught by the master are apprehended by the faculty of hearing, they are ascertained by the sense direct perception that possesses knowledge.

original: bden mod kyi 'on kyang nye bar ston pa'i dus su de tshad ma nyid du nges na de phyis kyi dus su ji ltar nges /
analyzed: bden mod kyi 'on kyang nye bar ston pa'i dus su de tshad ma nyid du nges na de phyis kyi dus su ji ltar nges /
