translated: That is true, but if they are ascertained as valid knowledge at the time of being taught, how are they ascertained at a later time?

original: rnam par rtog pas she na /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pas she na /
translated: If you say they are ascertained by conception,

original: bden te don la brten pa ma yin pas rtog pa ni tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: bden te don la brten pa ma yin pas rtog pa ni tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: that is true, but conception is not valid knowledge because it does not rely on the object.

original: yang na skyon de bsal bar bya ba'i phyir slob dpon gyis bstan pa'i phyis kyi dus su de nyid 'di yin no zhes ngo shes pas shes par byed de dper na ma ga dh'a'i 'bru gang yin pa de nyid yul 'di'i yin no zhes pa dang /üîΩgang ma ga dh'a ru mthong ba de 'di nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang na skyon de bsal bar bya ba'i phyir slob dpon gyis bstan pa'i phyis kyi dus su de nyid 'di yin no zhes ngo shes pas shes par byed de dper na ma ga dh'a'i 'bru gang yin pa de nyid yul 'di'i yin no zhes pa dang / gang ma ga dh'a ru mthong ba de 'di nyid yin zhe na /
translated: Or, in order to dispel that fault, the master teaches that at a later time it is recognized that this is that, just as it is said, ‚ÄúThe grain of Magadha is the grain of this land‚Äù and ‚ÄúThat which was seen in Magadha is this.‚Äù

original: de la smras pa /
analyzed: de la smras pa /
translated: To that it is said:

original: ngo shes pas ni tshad ma ma yin te sgra dang don 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngo shes pas ni tshad ma ma yin te sgra dang don 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not a valid means of knowledge because of the contradiction between the word and the meaning.

original: de zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi ming gi sgras 'das pa'i dus su so sor rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyi ming gi sgras 'das pa'i dus su so sor rtogs pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúthat‚Äù refers to the understanding of each individual thing in the past.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyi dngos po rtogs par byed pa thams cad kyi ming gi sgra'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni mngon sum gyi dngos po rtogs par byed pa thams cad kyi ming gi sgra'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúthis‚Äù refers to the understanding of all present things.

original: 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba dus so sor bstan pa'i sgra gnyis kyi gzhi mthun pa med pa'i phyir khyad par can gyi mtshan nyid mi rigs so //
analyzed: 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba dus so sor bstan pa'i sgra gnyis kyi gzhi mthun pa med pa'i phyir khyad par can gyi mtshan nyid mi rigs so //
translated: Since there is no common locus for the two words that indicate the past and present times, it is illogical that they have the characteristic of distinction.

original: ji ltar mi rigs te ;
analyzed: ji ltar mi rigs te ;
translated: How is it illogical?

original: rdzas tha dad pa ston par byed pa'i sgra dag gi don gcig la 'jug pa ni gzhi mthun pa'o //
analyzed: rdzas tha dad pa ston par byed pa'i sgra dag gi don gcig la 'jug pa ni gzhi mthun pa'o //
translated: The common locus of words that indicate different substances is the engagement of a single object.

original: de zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'das pa'i dus kyi yul gyi rdzas ston par byed pa dang / 'di zhes bya ba'i sgras kyang da ltar byung ba'i yul gyi rdzas so sor ston zhes pa 'dir ni 'di dang de gnyis kyi de nyid 'di yin zhes gzhi mthun par rigs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'das pa'i dus kyi yul gyi rdzas ston par byed pa dang / 'di zhes bya ba'i sgras kyang da ltar byung ba'i yul gyi rdzas so sor ston zhes pa 'dir ni 'di dang de gnyis kyi de nyid 'di yin zhes gzhi mthun par rigs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: The word ‚Äúthat‚Äù indicates the substance of the object in the past, and the word ‚Äúthis‚Äù indicates the substance of the object in the present. Here, it is reasonable to say that the reality of this and that is the same.

original: de la smras pa /
analyzed: de la smras pa /
translated: To this we reply:

original: gzhi mthun pa'i tha snyad 'di brtags pa pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gzhi mthun pa'i tha snyad 'di brtags pa pa yin gyi /
translated: This convention of sameness is a conceptual imputation.

original: dngos po'i yul can ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po'i yul can ma yin no //
translated: It is not based on a real object.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: dngos po gang 'das pa de'i 'jig pas de'i rdzas ji ltar rtogs /
analyzed: dngos po gang 'das pa de'i 'jig pas de'i rdzas ji ltar rtogs /
translated: How can the substance of a thing that has passed be conceived, since it has been destroyed?

original: gang de ltar byung ba de yang skad cig mas mi gnas pa'am chos can zhes 'di'i sgras ji ltar brjod nus /
analyzed: gang de ltar byung ba de yang skad cig mas mi gnas pa'am chos can zhes 'di'i sgras ji ltar brjod nus /
translated: How can the word ‚Äúthis‚Äù refer to that which has arisen in this way, since it does not endure for a second moment?

original: brjod ma thag tu 'jig pa'i sgra rnams rang gi bdag nyid kyi nus pa zad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod ma thag tu 'jig pa'i sgra rnams rang gi bdag nyid kyi nus pa zad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the words that have just been uttered have exhausted their own power.

original: ji ltar don gcig la 'di yin zhes ji ltar 'jug ces sgra 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar don gcig la 'di yin zhes ji ltar 'jug ces sgra 'gal ba'o //
translated: How can one say of a single object, ‚ÄúThis is that‚Äù? The words are contradictory.

original: sgra dang don dag gi 'gal ba ni 'brel pa med pa'i sgo @70a * //üîΩnas so sor bstan to //
analyzed: sgra dang don dag gi 'gal ba ni 'brel pa med pa'i sgo @70a * // nas so sor bstan to //
translated: The contradiction between the word and the object is shown by the absence of any relation between them.

original: bum pa la sogs pa'i sgra gcig gis kyang gtsor 'jug pa'i sgo nas dngos po so sor bstan pa ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa'i sgra gcig gis kyang gtsor 'jug pa'i sgo nas dngos po so sor bstan pa ma mthong ngo //
translated: We do not see that a single word such as ‚Äúpot‚Äù indicates a thing by its primary meaning.üîΩWe do not see that two words, one referring to a past object and the other to a present object, indicate a difference.

original: 'das pa dang mngon sum gyi dus kyi yul can dag gi sgra gnyis kyis so sor bstan pa ci mthong ngam gzhan yang de nyid la 'di yin zhes 'khrul pa kho na yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'das pa dang mngon sum gyi dus kyi yul can dag gi sgra gnyis kyis so sor bstan pa ci mthong ngam gzhan yang de nyid la 'di yin zhes 'khrul pa kho na yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, when one says, ‚ÄúThis is that,‚Äù there is only confusion, not a difference.

original: gang gi phyir gang ma ga dh'a la sogs pa'i yul du ba lang dang / 'bru la sogs pa mthong ba dang myong ba gang yin pa de dag gi gzugs kyi bye brag dang ro mchog la sogs pa gzhan yin la 'di dag gi yang gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gang ma ga dh'a la sogs pa'i yul du ba lang dang / 'bru la sogs pa mthong ba dang myong ba gang yin pa de dag gi gzugs kyi bye brag dang ro mchog la sogs pa gzhan yin la 'di dag gi yang gzhan yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For example, the particular forms and tastes of cows and grains, etc., seen and experienced in a country such as Magadha are different from those of cows and grains, etc., in other countries.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: yul la sogs pa'i bye brag gis //
analyzed: yul la sogs pa'i bye brag gis //
translated: By the difference of country,

original: rdzas kyi nus pa tha dad yin //
analyzed: rdzas kyi nus pa tha dad yin //
translated: The potency of substances is different.

original: de la gcig ni mthong ba yis //
analyzed: de la gcig ni mthong ba yis //
translated: One who sees one

original: gzhan du de dngos mthong nges med //
analyzed: gzhan du de dngos mthong nges med //
translated: Otherwise, it is not certain that one sees the thing.üîΩ

original: ces 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ces 'byung ngo //
translated: Otherwise, it is not certain that one sees the thing.

original: dper na lho'i phyogs kyi aa ru ra bdam par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: dper na lho'i phyogs kyi aa ru ra bdam par byed pa yin te /
translated: For example, one should take the myrobalan fruit of the south,

original: gzhan du khrus sman du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du khrus sman du 'gyur ro //
translated: otherwise it becomes a medicinal bath.

original: yul gyi bye brag re zhig 'jog na dngos po thams cad rang rang gi gzugs su yod pa ma yin te zhes gang gang gis brjod cing 'brel lo //
analyzed: yul gyi bye brag re zhig 'jog na dngos po thams cad rang rang gi gzugs su yod pa ma yin te zhes gang gang gis brjod cing 'brel lo //
translated: If one posits a particular country, it is not that all things exist in their own form.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: 'du byed thams cad skad cig ma //
analyzed: 'du byed thams cad skad cig ma //
translated: All formations are momentary.

original: mi gnas bya ba ga la yod //
analyzed: mi gnas bya ba ga la yod //
translated: How can there be non-abiding action?

original: gang yod de nyid bya ba ste //üîΩbyed pa po yang de nyid bshad //
analyzed: gang yod de nyid bya ba ste // byed pa po yang de nyid bshad //
translated: That which exists is the action itself,

original: ces 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ces 'byung ngo //
translated: and the agent is also explained as that itself.

original: de'i phyir dran pa'i shes pa ltar ngo shes pa yang don gyi yul can ma yin pas tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir dran pa'i shes pa ltar ngo shes pa yang don gyi yul can ma yin pas tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, like the consciousness of memory, recognition also does not have an object, so it is not a valid cognition.

original: rjes su dpag pas kyang rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa rnams kyi nges pa med de /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas kyang rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa rnams kyi nges pa med de /
translated: Also, there is no certainty through inference regarding vajra repetition and so on.

original: de ni rtags dang rtags can gyi dngos po'i 'brel pa'i sgo nas rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: de ni rtags dang rtags can gyi dngos po'i 'brel pa'i sgo nas rtogs pa ste /
translated: That is understood through the connection between the reason and the property to be proven.

original: me dang du ba bzhin no //
analyzed: me dang du ba bzhin no //
translated: Like fire and smoke.

original: de lta bu'i rtags rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa rnams la med do //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rtags rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa rnams la med do //
translated: Such a reason does not exist for vajra repetition, etc.

original: rlung gi de kho na nyid dang sngags kyi de kho na nyid med par mi 'byung ba'i rdo rje bzlas pa'i shes pa ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis nges par 'dzin ce na /
analyzed: rlung gi de kho na nyid dang sngags kyi de kho na nyid med par mi 'byung ba'i rdo rje bzlas pa'i shes pa ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyis nges par 'dzin ce na /
translated: If you say that the knowledge of vajra repetition, which does not occur without the reality of wind and the reality of mantra, is ascertained by natural reasoning,

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: bye brag tu dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bye brag tu dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the specific observation.

original: rlung gi de kho na nyid ni thig le phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: rlung gi de kho na nyid ni thig le phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro //
translated: The reality of wind is the yoga of the subtle drop.

original: sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi yi ge gsum mam yi ge aa'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi yi ge gsum mam yi ge aa'o //
translated: The reality of mantra is the three syllables or the syllable A.

original: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa yang 'jug pa la sogs pa'i bya ba'i gzhi srog dang rtsol ba dang me dang mnyam pa'i ngo bo yin zhes bye brag go //
analyzed: rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa yang 'jug pa la sogs pa'i bya ba'i gzhi srog dang rtsol ba dang me dang mnyam pa'i ngo bo yin zhes bye brag go //
translated: The stage of vajra repetition is the basis of the activity of entering, etc., and is the nature of the life-force, the exertion, and the fire.

original: de'i bdag nyid kyi 'brel pas ni byas pa dang / mi rtag pa dang shing dang sha @70b pa bzhin dbyer med par nges par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyi 'brel pas ni byas pa dang / mi rtag pa dang shing dang sha @70b pa bzhin dbyer med par nges par byed pa'o //
translated: The connection of identity ascertains the inseparability of the product, the impermanent, and the wood and the axe.

original: mi dmigs pa'i gtan tshigs kyis kyang rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa yang nges par mi nus te /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i gtan tshigs kyis kyang rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa yang nges par mi nus te /
translated: The reason of nonapprehension also cannot ascertain vajra repetition, etc.,

original: dngos po med pa'i tha snyad de'i yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i tha snyad de'i yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the convention of nonexistence is its object.

original: 'dir chos can thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi ngo bo de kho na nyid dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag gis brjod du med par grags so //
analyzed: 'dir chos can thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi ngo bo de kho na nyid dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag gis brjod du med par grags so //
translated: Here, the reality which is the nature of the reality of all bases is renowned as inexpressible by entity and nonentity.

original: de'i phyir mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag gis gang ma grub pa'i rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa'i de rnams tshad ma med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag gis gang ma grub pa'i rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa'i de rnams tshad ma med pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, those vajra repetitions, etc., which are not established by direct perception and inference, are certainly without valid cognition.

original: de la smras pa /
analyzed: de la smras pa /
translated: To this we reply:

original: mngon sum kho nas 'grub pa yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum kho nas 'grub pa yin te /
translated: They are established by direct perception alone.

original: yang rnam pa bzhi yin pas rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyis rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa mngon par byang chub pa'i bar du nges par byed do //
analyzed: yang rnam pa bzhi yin pas rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyis rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa mngon par byang chub pa'i bar du nges par byed do //
translated: Since it is of four kinds, the direct perception of self-awareness ascertains vajra repetition, etc., up to manifest enlightenment.

original: rlung dang sngags kyi de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i thig le tsam bsgom pa ni rang gi mngon sum gyi yul kho na'o //
analyzed: rlung dang sngags kyi de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i thig le tsam bsgom pa ni rang gi mngon sum gyi yul kho na'o //
translated: The meditation on the mere drop called the reality of wind and mantra is the domain of one's own direct perception.

original: thig le bsgom pa zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi chos te sems las byung ba'o //
analyzed: thig le bsgom pa zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi chos te sems las byung ba'o //
translated: The meditation on the drop is a dharma of concentration, a mental function.

original: sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang rang rig pa'i yul yin no //
analyzed: sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang rang rig pa'i yul yin no //
translated: The dharmas that are mental functions are the domain of one's own awareness.

original: rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid ni sems dang sems las byung ba thams cad rang gis rig pa'o //
analyzed: rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid ni sems dang sems las byung ba thams cad rang gis rig pa'o //
translated: The definition of one's own awareness direct perception is that it is the awareness of all minds and mental functions by oneself.

original: sems la rnam par dag pa yang rnam par shes pa gsum gnas gyur pa'i mtshan nyid 'od gsal ba de nyid kyi rjes su myong ngo //
analyzed: sems la rnam par dag pa yang rnam par shes pa gsum gnas gyur pa'i mtshan nyid 'od gsal ba de nyid kyi rjes su myong ngo //
translated: The purification of the mind is the experience of just that clear light which is the definition of the transformation of the three consciousnesses.

original: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa la yang sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis nye bar mtshon pa'i ye shes kyi sku thob pa ste /
analyzed: bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa la yang sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyis nye bar mtshon pa'i ye shes kyi sku thob pa ste /
translated: In the stage of self-consecration, one attains the body of gnosis illustrated by the twelve examples of illusion,

original: sems las byung ba'o //
analyzed: sems las byung ba'o //
translated: which is a mental function.

original: thob pa dang ma thob pa dang rigs gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed kyang sems las byung ba nyid do //
analyzed: thob pa dang ma thob pa dang rigs gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa sems dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed kyang sems las byung ba nyid do //
translated: And the mental factors such as attainment, nonattainment, and belonging to the same class are also mental factors.

original: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa la yang bde ba chen po 'od gsal ba 'dod chags la sogs pa dang bral ba ni rang rig pa nyid do //
analyzed: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa la yang bde ba chen po 'od gsal ba 'dod chags la sogs pa dang bral ba ni rang rig pa nyid do //
translated: And in the stages of manifest enlightenment, the great bliss of clear light, free from desire and so on, is self-awareness.

original: bzhi po de dag rang rig pa ste /
analyzed: bzhi po de dag rang rig pa ste /
translated: These four are self-awareness.

original: ma 'khrul zhing gsal bar snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma 'khrul zhing gsal bar snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are nonerroneous and clearly manifest.

original: rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i dngos po las skyes pa'i phyir rtog pa med pa'o zhes mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid las ma 'das pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i dngos po las skyes pa'i phyir rtog pa med pa'o zhes mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid las ma 'das pa'o //
translated: Because they arise from intrinsically real things, they are nonconceptual. Thus they do not transcend the characteristics of direct perception.

original: ji skad du /üîΩmngon sum mi rtog mi slu ba //
analyzed: ji skad du / mngon sum mi rtog mi slu ba //
translated: As it is said:

original: zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: Direct perception is nonconceptual and nondeceptive.

original: rim pa tha ma ni rnal 'byor gyis thob pa yin te /
analyzed: rim pa tha ma ni rnal 'byor gyis thob pa yin te /
translated: The final stage is attained through yoga,

original: gang gi phyir de ni lhun gyis grub pa'i yang dag pa'i don la bsgom @71a * //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ni lhun gyis grub pa'i yang dag pa'i don la bsgom @71a * //
translated: because it is the meditation on the spontaneously present perfect meaning.

original: pa mthar thug pa'i dbang gis rdo rje'i sku lag mthil gyi skyu ru ra bzhin du dngos po thams cad mthong ba la brtson pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin pas rtog pa med cing ma 'khrul pa yin no //
analyzed: pa mthar thug pa'i dbang gis rdo rje'i sku lag mthil gyi skyu ru ra bzhin du dngos po thams cad mthong ba la brtson pa thams cad mkhyen pa yin pas rtog pa med cing ma 'khrul pa yin no //
translated: By the power of the ultimate stage, the vajra body, like a myrobalan fruit in the palm of the hand, is seen in all things. Since it is omniscience, it is non-conceptual and non-erroneous.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis gsal ba ni //
analyzed: bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis gsal ba ni //
translated: The clarity by the power of meditation

original: 'jigs pa la sogs gsal ba bzhin //
analyzed: 'jigs pa la sogs gsal ba bzhin //
translated: is like the clarity of fear, etc.

original: mi slu ba yis shes pa gang //
analyzed: mi slu ba yis shes pa gang //
translated: The cognition that is non-deceptive

original: de ni rtog med mngon sum mo //üîΩzhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de ni rtog med mngon sum mo // zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: is non-conceptual direct perception.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa tshad ma nyid du brtags pa'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa tshad ma nyid du brtags pa'o //
translated: The perfection stage is established as valid cognition.

original: da ni 'di ltar dpyad par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni 'di ltar dpyad par bya ste /
translated: Now, this should be analyzed:

original: gsang ba 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud chen po 'di gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis kyi nang nas gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: gsang ba 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud chen po 'di gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis kyi nang nas gang yin zhe na /
translated: Among the twelve branches of scripture, which branch of this great yoga tantra of Guhyasamaja is it?

original: smras pa / mdo sde zhes bya ba 'di yin te /
analyzed: smras pa / mdo sde zhes bya ba 'di yin te /
translated: It is said to be called sutra.

original: de yang zab pa dang rgya che ba'i tshig gi don mtshon par byed pas mdo zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de yang zab pa dang rgya che ba'i tshig gi don mtshon par byed pas mdo zhes bya'o //
translated: Moreover, it is called sutra because it indicates the meaning of the words of the profound and vast.

original: 'o na dpal gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud yin na /
analyzed: 'o na dpal gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud yin na /
translated: Now, if the tantra called glorious Guhyasamaja is a great yoga tantra,

original: ji ltar mdo zhes bshad ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar mdo zhes bshad ce na /
translated: how is it explained as a sutra?

original: smras pa / yan lag yin pa'i phyir de'i tha snyad yin te /
analyzed: smras pa / yan lag yin pa'i phyir de'i tha snyad yin te /
translated: It is said: It is a convention because it is a branch.

original: rgyud kyi mdo zhes bya ba yan lag gtso bo yin te /
analyzed: rgyud kyi mdo zhes bya ba yan lag gtso bo yin te /
translated: The sutra of the tantra is called the principal branch.

original: de'i phyir de nyid kyis bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de nyid kyis bstan pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is taught by that alone.

original: gdengs ka can dang sna can bzhin no //
analyzed: gdengs ka can dang sna can bzhin no //
translated: It is like the hood and the nose.üîΩNow, since the principal branch of the tantra is called the sutra, it is appropriate to speak of the other branches. What are those branches?

original: 'o na rgyud kyi yan lag gtso bo mdo sde zhes smras pas yan lag gzhan rnams kyang smra bar bya ba'i rigs so zhes yan lag de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na rgyud kyi yan lag gtso bo mdo sde zhes smras pas yan lag gzhan rnams kyang smra bar bya ba'i rigs so zhes yan lag de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: It is said:üîΩThe sutra, valid knowledge, the established branches,üîΩthe complete, the reply to questions,üîΩthe brief teaching, the extensive explanation, the sequence,

original: smras pa / mdo dang tshad ma yan lag grub pa dang // ma tshang med dang 'dri la lan 'debs dang // mdor bstan pa dang rgyas bshad go rims dang // ming dang nye bar bstan pa rgyud kun yin //
analyzed: smras pa / mdo dang tshad ma yan lag grub pa dang // ma tshang med dang 'dri la lan 'debs dang // mdor bstan pa dang rgyas bshad go rims dang // ming dang nye bar bstan pa rgyud kun yin //
translated: the name, and the close teaching are all tantras.

original: mdo dang tshad ma yan lag rnams ni mdo dang tshad ma dang yan lag rnams so //
analyzed: mdo dang tshad ma yan lag rnams ni mdo dang tshad ma dang yan lag rnams so //
translated: The sutra, valid knowledge, and the branches are the sutra, valid knowledge, and the branches.

original: de rnams grub pa ni mdo dang tshad ma yan lag grub pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams grub pa ni mdo dang tshad ma yan lag grub pa'o //
translated: The establishment of these is the establishment of the branches of the s≈´tra and the pramƒÅ·πáas.

original: 'grub pa ni yod pa zhes don gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: 'grub pa ni yod pa zhes don gzhan ma yin no //
translated: The establishment is not a different object than existence.

original: 'grub pa'i sgra ni re re dang sbyar te mdo grub pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'grub pa'i sgra ni re re dang sbyar te mdo grub pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúestablishment‚Äù is applied to each, such as ‚Äúthe establishment of the s≈´tra,‚Äù and so on.

original: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i mdo grub pa zhes bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i mdo grub pa zhes bshad par bya ste /
translated: It should be explained that the establishment of the s≈´tra is endowed with characteristics.

original: gzhan du na mtshan nyid dang mi ldan pa'i mdo rgyud kyi yan lag tu 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan du na mtshan nyid dang mi ldan pa'i mdo rgyud kyi yan lag tu 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Otherwise, a s≈´tra that is not endowed with characteristics would become a branch of the treatise.üîΩIt is said:

original: smras pa / brjod par mi bya ste /
analyzed: smras pa / brjod par mi bya ste /
translated: It should not be expressed,

original: med par mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med par mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not occur without.

original: mtshan nyid grub pa ma gtogs par mdo nyid mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshan nyid grub pa ma gtogs par mdo nyid mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Except for the establishment of the characteristics, the s≈´tra itself would not occur.

original: de'i phyir mtshan nyid brjod par mi bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir mtshan nyid brjod par mi bya ste /
translated: Therefore, the characteristics should not be expressed.

original: yang na mdo zhes bya ba ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: yang na mdo zhes bya ba ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Or, why is it called a s≈´tra?

original: smras pa / don @71b mdor bstan pas na mdo'o //
analyzed: smras pa / don @71b mdor bstan pas na mdo'o //
translated: It is said: It is a s≈´tra because it teaches the meaning in brief.

original: khyad par gyi don de dag ston par byed pas na mdo'o //
analyzed: khyad par gyi don de dag ston par byed pas na mdo'o //
translated: It is a s≈´tra because it teaches those specific meanings.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te zhes bya ba de'i bshad pa rnam pa bzhi'i rigs pas bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / rdo rje bzlas pa dang / sems rnam par dag pa dang /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te zhes bya ba de'i bshad pa rnam pa bzhi'i rigs pas bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / rdo rje bzlas pa dang / sems rnam par dag pa dang /
translated: Then, the Blessed One entered the meditative absorption called ‚ÄúVajra Lamp of Wisdom,‚Äù which is indicated by the four explanations of the reasoning of the creation stage, vajra repetition, the purities of the mind,

original: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'od gsal ba dang / zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa rnams mtshon to //
analyzed: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'od gsal ba dang / zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa rnams mtshon to //
translated: self-consecration, clear light, and the stage of union.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: Similarly,

original: dngos po thams cad dang bral ba //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad dang bral ba //
translated: free from all things,üîΩfree from the aggregates, constituents, and sense fields,

original: phung po khams dang skye mched dang // gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa //
analyzed: phung po khams dang skye mched dang // gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa //
translated: free from apprehendeds and apprehenders,

original: chos bdag med pa mnyam nyid pas //
analyzed: chos bdag med pa mnyam nyid pas //
translated: the equality of the objective selflessness

original: rang sems gzod nas ma skyes pa //
analyzed: rang sems gzod nas ma skyes pa //
translated: of one‚Äôs own mind from the beginning is unborn,

original: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: the nature of emptiness.

original: zhes bya bas rang gi sems la dam bca' ba dang / gtan tshigs dag nyid kyis gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya bas rang gi sems la dam bca' ba dang / gtan tshigs dag nyid kyis gsungs so //
translated: Thus, he taught the thesis and the reason of one‚Äôs own mind.

original: de dag gzung bas bsgrub bya bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gzung bas bsgrub bya bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: They are apprehended in order to prove the probandum.

original: dpe med pa'i sgrub par byed pas sgrub mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba nas /

original: lag pa dang rkang pa la sogs pas lus bzhin no //

original: de la bcom ldan 'das khams gsum ma lus pa'i bden pa mkhyen pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi dngos po thams cad kyi bden pa gzigs nas ming btags pa la rang gzugs kyi rgyu mtshan can gyi sgra med de /

original: dper na mi bskyod pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i bag chags kyi rlung gis ma bskyod pas mi bskyod pa ste /

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //

translated: It is endowed with the correct meaning of the words and the intention.üîΩIt has the questions and answers.

analyzed: mdo don smra ba pos bshad bya //

analyzed: zhes 'byung bas dgongs pa la sogs pa drug po nges par bshad par bya ba yin zhe na /

analyzed: smras pa / brjod pa la sogs pa rnam pa lnga po 'dus pa'i phyir logs su ma bstan te /
translated: Reply: They are not explained separately because the five topics such as expression are included in the others.

original: brjod pa la sogs pa bshad pa'i dus nyid du dgongs pa la sogs pa'i don rtogs pas logs su mi bshad de /
analyzed: brjod pa la sogs pa bshad pa'i dus nyid du dgongs pa la sogs pa'i don rtogs pas logs su mi bshad de /
translated: The meaning of the purpose and so on is understood at the time of explaining expression and so forth, so they are not explained separately.

analyzed: mdo'i dgos pa ni dgos pa'i nang du 'dus pa dang ; / rgal lan dag ni 'brel pa bsdus pa'o //

original: 'dri ba dang lan kho na rgal lan dag go //
analyzed: 'dri ba dang lan kho na rgal lan dag go //

original: de nyid kyis ni 'das pa de //
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni 'das pa de //
translated: By that very thing, that past

original: de ni 'das pa zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de ni 'das pa zhes brjod do //
translated: Is called past.

original: brag gi za ma tog dpe yis //
analyzed: brag gi za ma tog dpe yis //
translated: By the example of the rock-cave,

original: sgra yis bdag dang 'jig rten dang // sgra ni sbal pa'i phung po yis //
analyzed: sgra yis bdag dang 'jig rten dang // sgra ni sbal pa'i phung po yis //
translated: and the sound of the mass of frogs,

original: rang nyid kyis ni dman par byas //
analyzed: rang nyid kyis ni dman par byas //
translated: are made inferior by themselves.üîΩThe letters, words, and speech,

original: yi ge tshig dang ngag rnams dang // rtags dang tshig gi tshogs dag nyid //
analyzed: yi ge tshig dang ngag rnams dang // rtags dang tshig gi tshogs dag nyid //
translated: and the collection of signs and words,üîΩare all false,

original: bya ba byed pa 'brel pa rnams //
analyzed: bya ba byed pa 'brel pa rnams //
translated: because they are related to the performance of actions.

original: brdzun yin pas na rjod byed min //üîΩtshig bshad tshig rkang lnga 'am ni //
analyzed: brdzun yin pas na rjod byed min // tshig bshad tshig rkang lnga 'am ni //
translated: Therefore, they are not expressive.üîΩWhy not accept that the meaning is expressed

original: gsum gyis kyang ni cis mi 'dod //
analyzed: gsum gyis kyang ni cis mi 'dod //
translated: by five or three lines of explanation?

original: ngag ni brjod bya rag las phyir //
analyzed: ngag ni brjod bya rag las phyir //
translated: Because speech depends on the expressed meaning,

original: mkha' 'gro ma yi brda ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi brda ltar 'gyur //
translated: it would be like the signs of a dakini.

original: gzung bar bya ba'i chos rnams la //
analyzed: gzung bar bya ba'i chos rnams la //
translated: Regarding the phenomena to be apprehended,

original: sngon gyi mkhas par 'dod rnams kyis //
analyzed: sngon gyi mkhas par 'dod rnams kyis //
translated: those who are considered wise in the past,üîΩhave fallen into the abyss of Sanskrit

original: sgra yi legs sbyar g-yang sa ru //
analyzed: sgra yi legs sbyar g-yang sa ru //
translated: grammar with regard to phenomena.

original: ae ma'o 'jig rten lhung bar byas //
analyzed: ae ma'o 'jig rten lhung bar byas //
translated: Alas! They have caused the world to fall.

original: 'di ni snang zhes brjod pa la //
analyzed: 'di ni snang zhes brjod pa la //
translated: When it is said, This appears,

original: dris pa mkhas pa gang gis ni //üîΩmgo nas bskor nas lag g-yas kyi //
analyzed: dris pa mkhas pa gang gis ni // mgo nas bskor nas lag g-yas kyi //
translated: what wise person would ask,üîΩWho is it that appears?

original: de ltar gang gis ston par byed //
analyzed: de ltar gang gis ston par byed //
translated: And in what way is it shown?

original: gzhan gyis gzhan ni mi rig ste //
analyzed: gzhan gyis gzhan ni mi rig ste //
translated: One cannot know another through another,

original: 'brel pa med pas skye mi 'gyur //
analyzed: 'brel pa med pas skye mi 'gyur //
translated: Because there is no relation, there is no arising.

original: gzhan du ral gri phog pa la //
analyzed: gzhan du ral gri phog pa la //
translated: In another case, when a sword strikes,

original: gzhan la 'gyur bar byed dam ci //
analyzed: gzhan la 'gyur bar byed dam ci //
translated: does it transform into something else?

original: bya ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: bya ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
translated: By the nature of the absence of action,

original: gang gis gang gi 'dir ston byed //üîΩdngos med las byung dngos po yis //
analyzed: gang gis gang gi 'dir ston byed // dngos med las byung dngos po yis //
translated: by what and where is it shown here?üîΩA thing that arises from a non-thing

original: dngos po gang las bskyed pa med //
analyzed: dngos po gang las bskyed pa med //
translated: does not give rise to any thing.

original: de bas skyob pa rnams kyis ni //
analyzed: de bas skyob pa rnams kyis ni //
translated: Therefore, the protectors

original: 'byung ba chen po zhes bshad do //
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po zhes bshad do //
translated: have explained the great elements.

original: 'byung ba kun gyi sngon gyur pas //
analyzed: 'byung ba kun gyi sngon gyur pas //
translated: Since it precedes all elements,

original: nges tshig mkhas pa rnams kyis gsungs //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa sngon gyi slob dpon gyi tshad ma'i tshig rnams kyis gsal ba'i sgra dang don gyi 'brel pa la ngag gi tshad ma nyid med pa'i phyir brjod pa la sogs pa'i tshig tsam gyis @75a * //
analyzed: nges tshig mkhas pa rnams kyis gsungs // zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngon gyi slob dpon gyi tshad ma'i tshig rnams kyis gsal ba'i sgra dang don gyi 'brel pa la ngag gi tshad ma nyid med pa'i phyir brjod pa la sogs pa'i tshig tsam gyis @75a * //
translated: the etymologists have declared it.üîΩThus, by the authoritative statements of the former masters, the relation between the word clear and its meaning is not established by the authority of speech alone.

original: ji ltar nges par byed ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar nges par byed ce na /
translated: How can it be ascertained by mere words such as expression and so on?

original: de la smras pa /
analyzed: de la smras pa /
translated: To that, we reply:

original: ngag las the tshom skye ba ni /
analyzed: ngag las the tshom skye ba ni /
translated: Doubt arises from speech,

original: de yang rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: and that also has three aspects:

original: don dang ldan pa'i the tshom dang / don med pa'i the tshom dang / don yod pa dang don med pa'i the tshom mo //üîΩde la don dang ldan pa'i the tshom ni dper na /
analyzed: don dang ldan pa'i the tshom dang / don med pa'i the tshom dang / don yod pa dang don med pa'i the tshom mo // de la don dang ldan pa'i the tshom ni dper na /
translated: doubt that is meaningful, doubt that is meaningless, and doubt that is both meaningful and meaningless.

original: sa 'og na gnas pa'i gter 'don pa bzhin no //
analyzed: sa 'og na gnas pa'i gter 'don pa bzhin no //
translated: Among these, doubt that is meaningful is like the doubt of one who is seeking treasure buried underground.

original: don med pa ni dper na shugs che ba'i gtsang po la gcod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: don med pa ni dper na shugs che ba'i gtsang po la gcod pa bzhin no //
translated: Doubt that is meaningless is like the doubt of one who is trying to dam the current of a mighty river.

original: don yod pa dang med pa'i the tshom ni dper na ro langs bslang ba bzhin no //
analyzed: don yod pa dang med pa'i the tshom ni dper na ro langs bslang ba bzhin no //
translated: Doubt that is both meaningful and meaningless is like the doubt of one who is trying to raise a zombie.

original: de la don dang ldan pa ni 'jug pa'i yan lag go //
analyzed: de la don dang ldan pa ni 'jug pa'i yan lag go //
translated: Among these, doubt that is meaningful is a limb of engagement.

original: don dang mi ldan pa dang don med pa dang / yod pa'i the tshom dag ni ldog pa'i yan lag go //
analyzed: don dang mi ldan pa dang don med pa dang / yod pa'i the tshom dag ni ldog pa'i yan lag go //
translated: Doubt that is meaningless and doubt that is both meaningful and meaningless are limbs of disengagement.

original: 'dir ni dang po'i tshig tshad ma med pa las ci 'dir brjod pa la sogs pa yod dam med ces the tshom la 'jug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dir ni dang po'i tshig tshad ma med pa las ci 'dir brjod pa la sogs pa yod dam med ces the tshom la 'jug par 'gyur te /
translated: Here, the first is doubt about whether what is being said exists or not, and so on.

original: de'i rjes su rim pa gnyis kyis mtshon pa'i brjod par bya ba dang / de rjod par byed pa'i tshig gi tshogs dang de dag gi 'brel pa yang thos nas bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i rim pas tha mal pa'i lus bzlog pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdo rje'i sku'i mtshan nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i phrin las thams cad pa
analyzed: de'i rjes su rim pa gnyis kyis mtshon pa'i brjod par bya ba dang / de rjod par byed pa'i tshig gi tshogs dang de dag gi 'brel pa yang thos nas bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i rim pas tha mal pa'i lus bzlog pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdo rje'i sku'i mtshan nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i phrin las thams cad pa
translated: After that, having heard the collection of words that express the topics indicated by the two stages, and their connections, one should attain the state of MahƒÅvajradhara, who has all activities, the characteristics of the supramundane vajra body, which reverses the ordinary body, through the stages of reflection and meditation.üîΩAfter that, one should also make all transmigrating beings into vajra holders.

original: thob nas / de'i rjes thogs su 'gro ba thams cad kyang rdo rje 'dzin par byed pa ni dgos pa'i dgos pa yang la la yod par 'dod pas bstan bcos 'di legs zhes mgu zhing bya ba byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob nas / de'i rjes thogs su 'gro ba thams cad kyang rdo rje 'dzin par byed pa ni dgos pa'i dgos pa yang la la yod par 'dod pas bstan bcos 'di legs zhes mgu zhing bya ba byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since some assert that this is the ultimate purpose, this treatise is excellent.

original: de'i phyir don gyi the tshom las 'jug pa ni rigs pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir don gyi the tshom las 'jug pa ni rigs pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, it is only logical that one should engage in this treatise in order to eliminate doubts about the meaning.

original: gzhan dag gis kyang khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pas rgol bar byed pa gang yin pa de'i gtan tshigs ma grub pa yin zhes smra bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan dag gis kyang khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pas rgol bar byed pa gang yin pa de'i gtan tshigs ma grub pa yin zhes smra bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Others argue that the reason is not established because the non-observation of the pervasion is not observed.

original: brjod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brjod pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: To explain this, the characteristics of expression and so on will be explained.

original: 'dir 'brel pa rtsom pa'i dus su slob dpon zla grags rang 'dod pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal ba rtsom pa byed de /
analyzed: 'dir 'brel pa rtsom pa'i dus su slob dpon zla grags rang 'dod pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal ba rtsom pa byed de /
translated: Here, at the time of composing the treatise, the master Candrakƒ´rti pays homage to the deity of his own choice.

original: de la rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: de la rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: This has three parts:

original: mthun pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang gnyi ga'i rjes su 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: mthun pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang gnyi ga'i rjes su 'gro ba'o //
translated: being in accord, being in accordance, and following both.

original: de la mthun pa zhes bya ba ni gang bstan bcos dang mi 'gal ba yin gyi bstan bcos mkhan gyi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de la mthun pa zhes bya ba ni gang bstan bcos dang mi 'gal ba yin gyi bstan bcos mkhan gyi ni ma yin no //
translated: Here, being in accord means not contradicting the treatise, but not the author of the treatise.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

original: dpal gyi phun sum tshogs pa'i sa las 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa so sor thar pa'i rab tu byed pa'i dang po bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal gyi phun sum tshogs pa'i sa las 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa so sor thar pa'i rab tu byed pa'i dang po bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: in the first chapter of the PrƒÅtimok·π£a, it says, Having transcended the stage of glorious abundance... and so on. The Blessed One, being free from attachment, pays homage.

original: @75b rjes su mthun pa zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos dang me 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: @75b rjes su mthun pa zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos dang me 'gal ba yin te /
translated: The term consistent means not contradictory to the treatise.

original: bstan bcos mkhan gyi mngon par 'dod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: bstan bcos mkhan gyi mngon par 'dod pa kho na'o //
translated: It is just what the author of the treatise intends.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

original: ngag ni rtogs par byed pa mchog /'jig rten mgon po la btud nas //
analyzed: ngag ni rtogs par byed pa mchog /'jig rten mgon po la btud nas //
translated: The verse Having bowed to the supreme benefactor, the Lord of the World...

original: zhes snang ba'i phreng ba'i 'brel pa dang po la phyag 'tshal ba bzhin no //
analyzed: zhes snang ba'i phreng ba'i 'brel pa dang po la phyag 'tshal ba bzhin no //
translated: is the initial connection of the Garland of Luminosity.

original: de la ni bstan bcos kyi brjod par bya ba dang mthun pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la ni bstan bcos kyi brjod par bya ba dang mthun pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not consistent with the subject matter of the treatise,

original: 'on kyang 'grel pa mkhan gyi yi dam yin pas rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'grel pa mkhan gyi yi dam yin pas rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: but since it is the personal vow of the commentator, it is consistent.

original: gnyi ga'i rjes su 'gro ba ni gang bstan bcos dang bstan bcos mkhan po dag gis brjod par bya ba dang mngon par 'dod pas gnyi ga'i rjes su 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: gnyi ga'i rjes su 'gro ba ni gang bstan bcos dang bstan bcos mkhan po dag gis brjod par bya ba dang mngon par 'dod pas gnyi ga'i rjes su 'gro ba'o //
translated: That which is consistent with both is that which is the subject matter and intention of both the treatise and the author of the treatise.

original: gzhan yang 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'di lta ste /
translated: Moreover, it is like this.

original: khams gsum spyod pa las grol zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i phyag 'tshal ba'i tshig la brjod par bya ba dang / rang 'dod pa'i lha gnyi ga'i rjes su 'gro'o //
analyzed: khams gsum spyod pa las grol zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i phyag 'tshal ba'i tshig la brjod par bya ba dang / rang 'dod pa'i lha gnyi ga'i rjes su 'gro'o //
translated: The words freed from the activities of the three realms and so on are the object of homage, and the homage itself is the homage that follows both the object and the deity of one's own desire.

original: de ltar 'dir yang dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal ba ni slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i de nyid rang 'dod pa'i lha yin te /
analyzed: de ltar 'dir yang dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal ba ni slob dpon zla ba grags pa'i de nyid rang 'dod pa'i lha yin te /
translated: Thus, here also, the homage to glorious Vajrasattva is the homage that follows both the object and the deity of the master Candrakƒ´rti's own desire.

original: dpal klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyis 'dod pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dpal klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyis 'dod pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it accords with the desire of glorious NƒÅgƒÅrjuna.

original: sgron ma gsal bar byed pa las kyang /
analyzed: sgron ma gsal bar byed pa las kyang /
translated: Also, in the Illuminating Lamp, it says:

original: de nyid brjod par bya ba yin te //
analyzed: de nyid brjod par bya ba yin te //
translated: That is the object of expression.

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo nas de nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo nas de nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is to be attained through all the doors of meditative concentration.

original: rjod pa dang brjod par bya ba'i bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i yin zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rjod pa dang brjod par bya ba'i bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i yin zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is the nature of the expression and the object of expression of MahƒÅvajradhara, as will be explained.

original: de'i phyir phyag 'tshal ba gnyi ga'i rjes su 'gro ba 'di yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir phyag 'tshal ba gnyi ga'i rjes su 'gro ba 'di yin no //
translated: Therefore, this homage follows both the object and the deity.

original: de ltar na phyag 'tshal ba byas pas cir 'gyur /
analyzed: de ltar na phyag 'tshal ba byas pas cir 'gyur /
translated: What is the purpose of paying homage?

original: bgegs nye bar zhi bar 'gyur zhes rigs pa gang zhig yod ce na /
analyzed: bgegs nye bar zhi bar 'gyur zhes rigs pa gang zhig yod ce na /
translated: What is the logic of the statement that ‚Äúobstructions are pacified‚Äù?

original: phyag 'tshal ba byas pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po'i yon tan brjod pa las skyes pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis bsod nams ma yin pa log par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal ba byas pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po'i yon tan brjod pa las skyes pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis bsod nams ma yin pa log par 'gyur ro //
translated: By paying homage, the accumulation of merit arises from the expression of the qualities of the Bhagavat MahƒÅvajradhara, and non-merit is reversed.

original: bsod nams ma yin pa las skyes pa'i bgegs bsod nams nye bar dmigs pas de dag med do zhes dgag par bya ba'i rgyu 'gal ba dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsod nams ma yin pa las skyes pa'i bgegs bsod nams nye bar dmigs pas de dag med do zhes dgag par bya ba'i rgyu 'gal ba dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Obstructions that arise from non-merit are negated by the observation of merit. The cause of negation is the observation of the contradiction.

original: phyag 'tshal ba de yang la las rnam pa bzhi ru 'dod de lus dang ngag dang yid dang bla na med pa'i mchod pas phyag 'tshal ba'o //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal ba de yang la las rnam pa bzhi ru 'dod de lus dang ngag dang yid dang bla na med pa'i mchod pas phyag 'tshal ba'o //
translated: That homage is asserted by some to be of four types: homage with body, speech, mind, and unsurpassed worship.

original: de la lus kyis ni yan lag lnga pa'i phyag go //
analyzed: de la lus kyis ni yan lag lnga pa'i phyag go //
translated: Among them, with the body, there is homage with five limbs.

original: ngag gis ni de'i yon tan gyi tshogs brjod pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: ngag gis ni de'i yon tan gyi tshogs brjod pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: With speech, there is the homage characterized by the expression of his qualities.

original: yid kyis ni de nyid rjes su dran pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyis ni de nyid rjes su dran pa'o //
translated: With the mind, there is the recollection of him.

original: @76a * // bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i phyag 'tshal ba ni de'i bdag nyid rjes su 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: @76a * // bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i phyag 'tshal ba ni de'i bdag nyid rjes su 'jug pa'o //
translated: The homage of unsurpassed worship is the engagement in the nature of that.

original: rab tu byed pa las /
analyzed: rab tu byed pa las /
translated: In the Pradƒ´poddyotana it is said:

original: ji ltar chu la chu bzhag dang // ji ltar mar la mar bzhin du //
analyzed: ji ltar chu la chu bzhag dang // ji ltar mar la mar bzhin du //
translated: Just as water in water, just as butter in butter,

original: rang gis rang gi ye shes ni //
analyzed: rang gis rang gi ye shes ni //
translated: one's own wisdom

original: legs mthong gang yin 'dir phyag yin //
analyzed: legs mthong gang yin 'dir phyag yin //
translated: is well seen here, this is homage.

original: zhes de lta bu'i phyag 'tshal ba yang 'dir 'dus pa kho na'o //
analyzed: zhes de lta bu'i phyag 'tshal ba yang 'dir 'dus pa kho na'o //
translated: Such homage is included here.

original: da ni phyag 'tshal ba bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni phyag 'tshal ba bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the homage will be explained.üîΩHaving paid homage to the glorious BhagavƒÅn Vajrasattva, etc.,

original: dpal ldan rgyud rgyal zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal nas /
analyzed: dpal ldan rgyud rgyal zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal nas /
translated: the master Candrakƒ´rti, having paid homage to the GuhyasamƒÅja, the tantra called the Glorious King of Tantras,üîΩthe Illuminating Lamp,

original: slob dpon zla ba grags pas 'dus pa ni gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud do ;
analyzed: slob dpon zla ba grags pas 'dus pa ni gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud do ;
translated: the GuhyasamƒÅja is the tantra called the Glorious GuhyasamƒÅja.

original: / rab gsal zhes bya ba ni gsal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: / rab gsal zhes bya ba ni gsal bar byed pa'o //
translated: Illuminating is that which illuminates.

original: 'dus pa ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: 'dus pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What kind of GuhyasamƒÅja?

original: dpal ldan rgyud rgyal dam pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi khyad par ro //
analyzed: dpal ldan rgyud rgyal dam pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi khyad par ro //
translated: The Glorious King of Tantras, the excellent one, is the distinction of this very one.

original: dpal ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs so //
analyzed: dpal ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs so //
translated: Glory is the collections of merit and wisdom.

original: de dang ldan pas na dpal ldan no //üîΩde bzhin du ni dang po snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed la dang po'i sbyor pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim gyis sems can ma lus pa'i don byas te de'i rjes la ngag la sogs pa rnam par dag par byed pa rim pa lnga'i mtshan
analyzed: de dang ldan pas na dpal ldan no // de bzhin du ni dang po snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed la dang po'i sbyor pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rim gyis sems can ma lus pa'i don byas te de'i rjes la ngag la sogs pa rnam par dag par byed pa rim pa lnga'i mtshan
translated: Endowed with that, he is glorious.

original: nyid ye shes kyi tshogs mngon du bya'o //
analyzed: nyid ye shes kyi tshogs mngon du bya'o //
translated: Similarly, first one generates the thought of great compassion, and by the stages of the concentrations beginning with the first application, one acts for the welfare of all sentient beings, and after that one should realize the characteristics of the five stages that purify speech and so forth, which are the collection of wisdom.

original: yang na dpal ni las kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: yang na dpal ni las kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa bzhi'o //
translated: Or, glory is the four, the karma consort and so forth.

original: de nye bar bstan pa yod pas dpal ldan no //
analyzed: de nye bar bstan pa yod pas dpal ldan no //
translated: Endowed with that, he is glorious.

original: de ltar dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyi dus su rigs ngan gyi bu mo la sogs pa las dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya med pas ye shes kyi phyag rgya bsams te /
analyzed: de ltar dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyi dus su rigs ngan gyi bu mo la sogs pa las dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya med pas ye shes kyi phyag rgya bsams te /
translated: Thus, at the time of the concentration of the supreme king of mandalas, one should imagine the gnosis consort, since there is no karma consort and no pledge consort, such as a low-caste girl.

original: bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid can phyag rgya chen po thob par 'gyur zhes bstan to //
analyzed: bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid can phyag rgya chen po thob par 'gyur zhes bstan to //
translated: One will attain the great seal, which has the characteristic of great bliss.

original: rgyud ni spyod pa la sogs pa'i rgyud do //
analyzed: rgyud ni spyod pa la sogs pa'i rgyud do //
translated: A tantra is a continuum of conduct and so forth.

original: de rnams kyi dam pa'i rgyal po ni rgyal po dam pa ste rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud do //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dam pa'i rgyal po ni rgyal po dam pa ste rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud do //
translated: The king of those is the supreme king, the tantra of the great yoga.

original: rgyud ces bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: rgyud ces bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is a tantra?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud phyi ma las gsungs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud phyi ma las gsungs te /
translated: The BhagavƒÅn says in the Later Tantra:

original: rgyud ni rgyun zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rgyud ni rgyun zhes bya ba ste /
translated: A tantra is called a continuum.

original: rgyun de rnam pa gsum du 'gyur //
analyzed: rgyun de rnam pa gsum du 'gyur //
translated: That continuum is of three types:

original: gzhi dang rang bzhin nyid dang ni //
analyzed: gzhi dang rang bzhin nyid dang ni //
translated: The basis, the nature itself,

original: 'gyur ba med pa rab dbye ba'o //
analyzed: 'gyur ba med pa rab dbye ba'o //
translated: and the classification of the unchanging.

original: rang bzhin rnam pa rgyu yin te //
analyzed: rang bzhin rnam pa rgyu yin te //
translated: The nature is of three types:

original: de bzhin 'gyur med 'bras bu yin //
analyzed: de bzhin 'gyur med 'bras bu yin //
translated: The cause, the unchanging result,

original: gzhi ni thabs zhes bshad pa ste //
analyzed: gzhi ni thabs zhes bshad pa ste //
translated: and the basis, which is explained as the method.

original: gsum gyis rgyud kyi don 'dus so //üîΩzhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gsum gyis rgyud kyi don 'dus so // zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: The meaning of tantra is included in these three.

original: de'i dgongs pa ni rgyu'i rgyud dang 'bras bu'i rgyud dang thabs kyi @76b rgyud do //
analyzed: de'i dgongs pa ni rgyu'i rgyud dang 'bras bu'i rgyud dang thabs kyi @76b rgyud do //
translated: The intended meaning of that is the causal tantra, the resultant tantra, and the method tantra.

original: de la rgyu'i rgyud ni gang du tshangs pa'i gnas dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo la sogs pa'i sgom pa bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de la rgyu'i rgyud ni gang du tshangs pa'i gnas dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo la sogs pa'i sgom pa bstan pa'o //
translated: The causal continuum is that in which the meditation on the Brahma abodes, the doors of liberation, and so forth are taught.

original: 'bras bu'i rgyud ni gang du rdo rje 'chang chen po'i phyag rgya chen po nges par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i rgyud ni gang du rdo rje 'chang chen po'i phyag rgya chen po nges par bstan pa'o //
translated: The resultant continuum is that in which the great seal of Great Vajradhara is taught.

original: thabs kyi rgyud ni gang du zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs nges par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: thabs kyi rgyud ni gang du zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs nges par bstan pa'o //
translated: The method continuum is that in which the collection of rites such as pacification are taught.

original: don so sor ston par byed pa'i rgyud rnams kyi rgyal po dam pa'o //
analyzed: don so sor ston par byed pa'i rgyud rnams kyi rgyal po dam pa'o //
translated: It is the supreme king of the tantras that reveal the individual meanings.

original: de nas las 'dzin pa'i bsdu ba bya'o //
analyzed: de nas las 'dzin pa'i bsdu ba bya'o //
translated: Then, the collection of the tantras that hold the actions should be made.

original: des ni rgyud thams cad kyi dam pa nyid nye bar bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: des ni rgyud thams cad kyi dam pa nyid nye bar bstan pa yin no //
translated: By that, the supreme nature of all the tantras is taught.

original: gal te rgyud thams cad kyi dam pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te rgyud thams cad kyi dam pa yin na /
translated: If it is the supreme of all the tantras,

original: de'i tshe don zab mo dang ldan pa'i phyir khyod kyis ji ltar bshad par nus pa zhe na /
analyzed: de'i tshe don zab mo dang ldan pa'i phyir khyod kyis ji ltar bshad par nus pa zhe na /
translated: then at that time, because it has profound meaning, how can you explain it?

original: rnal 'byor rgyud rnams kyi legs par bshad pa ni rnal 'byor kyi rgyud yan lag dang bshad pa'i rgyud sngar bshad pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rgyud rnams kyi legs par bshad pa ni rnal 'byor kyi rgyud yan lag dang bshad pa'i rgyud sngar bshad pa'o //
translated: The good explanation of the Yoga Tantras is the Yoga Tantra with its branches and the explanatory Tantras explained above.

original: de rnams kyi legs par bshad pa ni gsal bar bshad nus pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi legs par bshad pa ni gsal bar bshad nus pa'o //
translated: The good explanation of those is the ability to explain them clearly.

original: shin du gsal bar rnam par phye zhes pa ni de rnams ni khyad par ro ;
analyzed: shin du gsal bar rnam par phye zhes pa ni de rnams ni khyad par ro ;
translated: The words very clearly distinguished are a qualification.

original: / bshad pa ni don gsal bar rtogs pa'i rgyus so //
analyzed: / bshad pa ni don gsal bar rtogs pa'i rgyus so //
translated: The explanation is by the cause of understanding the meaning clearly.

original: rtsa ba'i rgyud ni bshad pa'i rgyud kho nas rtogs par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i rgyud ni bshad pa'i rgyud kho nas rtogs par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the Root Tantra is to be understood only by the Explanatory Tantra is that the Root Tantra is to be understood by the Explanatory Tantra alone.

original: rnal 'byor gyi don gang zhe na /
analyzed: rnal 'byor gyi don gang zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of Yoga?

original: rgyud phyi ma las kyang /
analyzed: rgyud phyi ma las kyang /
translated: The Later Tantra says:

original: thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor bas //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor bas //
translated: The union of method and wisdom

original: rnal 'byor zhes ni mngon par brjod //
analyzed: rnal 'byor zhes ni mngon par brjod //
translated: is called Yoga.

original: rang bzhin med pa shes rab ste //
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa shes rab ste //
translated: Wisdom is the absence of intrinsic nature;

original: thabs ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid do //üîΩzhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: thabs ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid do // zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: method is the characteristic of entities.

original: de'i dgongs pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pas snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bar bsgom pa ni thabs so //
analyzed: de'i dgongs pa ni bskyed pa'i rim pas snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bar bsgom pa ni thabs so //
translated: The intention of that is that the cultivation preceded by great compassion by means of the generation stage is method.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa gnyis pa dang bzhi pa dag gis chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid can stong pa nyid sgom pa ni shes rab bo //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa gnyis pa dang bzhi pa dag gis chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid can stong pa nyid sgom pa ni shes rab bo //
translated: The perfection stage, the second and fourth [empowerments], is wisdom, the meditation on emptiness, the characteristic of the lack of inherent existence of all phenomena.

original: de dag snyoms par zhugs pa ni rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: de dag snyoms par zhugs pa ni rnal 'byor ro //
translated: The union of those two is yoga.

original: yang na snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin nam //üîΩyang na gang du phyag rgya'i mnyam par sbyor ba dgongs pa de la dbang po gnyis kyis mnyam par sbyor ba /
analyzed: yang na snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin nam // yang na gang du phyag rgya'i mnyam par sbyor ba dgongs pa de la dbang po gnyis kyis mnyam par sbyor ba /
translated: Or, as before, the samadhi of the supreme conqueror mandala.

original: thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid rnal 'byor zhes bshad do //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid rnal 'byor zhes bshad do //
translated: Or, wherever there is the union of the two organs in union with the mudra, the characteristic of the union of method and wisdom is explained as yoga.

original: sems rnam par dag pa la sogs pa'i rim pa dag tu bde ba chen po bskyed pa'i slad du bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi dbye ba la dmigs te /
analyzed: sems rnam par dag pa la sogs pa'i rim pa dag tu bde ba chen po bskyed pa'i slad du bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi dbye ba la dmigs te /
translated: In the stages of the pure mind and so on, in order to generate great bliss, the distinction between the object of attainment and the means of attainment is observed.

original: thabs dang shes rab nyid du 'jog par byas pa gnyi ga snyoms par zhugs pa'i mtshan @77a * //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab nyid du 'jog par byas pa gnyi ga snyoms par zhugs pa'i mtshan @77a * //
translated: The characteristic of the union of both is posited as method and wisdom.

original: nyid ni rnal 'byor zhes bya'o //
analyzed: nyid ni rnal 'byor zhes bya'o //
translated: The self is called the yogin.

original: de bzhin du yang bshad pa'i bye brag gzhan rnams kyang 'og nas skabs skabs su 'chang par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du yang bshad pa'i bye brag gzhan rnams kyang 'og nas skabs skabs su 'chang par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, the other kinds of explanations will be given in their proper places below.

original: gal te rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kho nas rtsa ba'i rgyud bshad pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kho nas rtsa ba'i rgyud bshad pa yin na /
translated: If the Root Tantra is explained only by the Yoga Tantras,

original: de'i tshe 'grel pa brtsams pas ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'grel pa brtsams pas ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: what is the use of composing a commentary?

original: mtha' drug 'ching ba rnams kyis bcings pa zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: mtha' drug 'ching ba rnams kyis bcings pa zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The text says, bound by the six limits and the bonds.

original: mtha' drug ces bya ba'i bshad pa ni /
analyzed: mtha' drug ces bya ba'i bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of the six limits

original: 'og nas 'chad par gyur pa de nyid 'ching ba ni 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: 'og nas 'chad par gyur pa de nyid 'ching ba ni 'brel pa'o //
translated: is that which will be explained below. The bonds are the connections.

original: des bcings pa ni bcings pa ste de'i phyir rtogs par dka' zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: des bcings pa ni bcings pa ste de'i phyir rtogs par dka' zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Bound by them is bound. Therefore, it is difficult to understand, is the meaning.

original: gang gi phyir bshad pa'i rgyud kyis ni rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi tshig dang ngag gi don tsam so sor bstan par nus kyi mtha' drug gi bye brag dang rab tu dbye ba bshad par mi nus so zhes 'grel pa bya bar don dang ldan no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir bshad pa'i rgyud kyis ni rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi tshig dang ngag gi don tsam so sor bstan par nus kyi mtha' drug gi bye brag dang rab tu dbye ba bshad par mi nus so zhes 'grel pa bya bar don dang ldan no //
translated: Because the explanatory tantra can only explain the words and meanings of the root tantra individually, it cannot explain the specifics and divisions of the six parameters. Thus, it is meaningful to compose a commentary.

original: de lta na 'dus pa'i rgyan la sogs pa gzhan yod pas 'grel pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na 'dus pa'i rgyan la sogs pa gzhan yod pas 'grel pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: If that is so, since there are others such as the Guhyasamaja Ornament, what is the use of this commentary?

original: rgyal sras yul gyur zhes smos pa la rgyal ba'i sras ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa bral bar sa bcu'i dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa'o //
analyzed: rgyal sras yul gyur zhes smos pa la rgyal ba'i sras ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa bral bar sa bcu'i dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa'o //
translated: The phrase the domain of the victors' heirs refers to the bodhisattvas, the lords of the ten grounds, who are the heirs of the victors, free from the obscurations of affliction and the obscurations of cognition.

original: de rnams kyi yul du gyur pa ni bshad pa'i spyod yul 'dus pa 'di yin zhes 'dis bdag nyid mngon par shes pa thob pa nyid kyis snod du rung ba nyid du bstan pas 'grel pa byas pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi yul du gyur pa ni bshad pa'i spyod yul 'dus pa 'di yin zhes 'dis bdag nyid mngon par shes pa thob pa nyid kyis snod du rung ba nyid du bstan pas 'grel pa byas pa ste /
translated: This Guhyasamaja, the domain of explanation, is their domain. This shows that the author of the commentary is a suitable vessel by virtue of having attained the superknowledges himself, saying, This is the domain of explanation for them.

original: skye bo gzhan gyis 'grel pa byed mi nus so //
analyzed: skye bo gzhan gyis 'grel pa byed mi nus so //
translated: Other beings are unable to compose a commentary.

original: rgyud kyi ming bstan par bya ba'i phyir /üîΩrgyal ba rnams kyi 'dus pa gang yin pa //
analyzed: rgyud kyi ming bstan par bya ba'i phyir / rgyal ba rnams kyi 'dus pa gang yin pa //
translated: In order to indicate the name of the tantra,

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: it is said:üîΩThat which is the assembly of the victors.

original: rgyal ba rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o //
analyzed: rgyal ba rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o //
translated: The victors are the five tathagatas.

original: de rnams kyi 'dus pa ni gcig tu gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi 'dus pa ni gcig tu gyur pa'o //
translated: Their assembly is their becoming one.

original: dgongs pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: dgongs pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The intention is as follows:

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rigs brgya'i dbye ba nye bar bsdus te /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rigs brgya'i dbye ba nye bar bsdus te /
translated: Having summarized the hundred families of the stage of generation,

original: phung po lnga dang nyon mongs pa dang dbang po dang yul dang / rnam par shes pa dang 'byung ba dang rlung rnam pa lnga la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa spros te /
analyzed: phung po lnga dang nyon mongs pa dang dbang po dang yul dang / rnam par shes pa dang 'byung ba dang rlung rnam pa lnga la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa spros te /
translated: the BhagavƒÅn, Great Vajradhara, who is the nature of the five pristine consciousnesses, emanated the tathagatas, Vairochana, and so on, and purified the five aggregates, the five afflictions, the five sense organs, the five objects, the five sense consciousnesses, the five elements, the five kinds of air, and so on.

original: de dag gcig tu gyur pa dag gis mgrin pa gcig gis dang po zhu ba sngon du 'gro bar gsol ba gdab po //
analyzed: de dag gcig tu gyur pa dag gis mgrin pa gcig gis dang po zhu ba sngon du 'gro bar gsol ba gdab po //
translated: Those who became one made a request with one voice, preceded by the initial supplication.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de rnams la so sor bstan zhes rgyal ba rnams kyi 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de rnams la so sor bstan zhes rgyal ba rnams kyi 'dus pa'o //
translated: The Bhagavat also teaches them individually, and so there is a gathering of the victors.

original: yang na dam tshig gi dkyil @77b 'khor du thams cad phyung ba ni 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: yang na dam tshig gi dkyil @77b 'khor du thams cad phyung ba ni 'dus pa'o //
translated: Or else, the emergence of all in the mandala of commitment is a gathering.

original: yang na sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi ngo bo nyid yi ge gsum po 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis goms par gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo ro gcig par gyur pa ni 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: yang na sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi ngo bo nyid yi ge gsum po 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis goms par gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo ro gcig par gyur pa ni 'dus pa'o //
translated: Or else, when one becomes familiar with the three syllables, which are the essence of body, speech, and mind, through the process of entry, and so forth, the wheel of all the tathagatas becomes of one taste, and that is a gathering.

original: gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang gis dus su slob ma'i tshangs pa'i sgo nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug pas gcig tu gyur pa ni 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang gis dus su slob ma'i tshangs pa'i sgo nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug pas gcig tu gyur pa ni 'dus pa'o //
translated: Moreover, when the tathagatas enter through the Brahma aperture of the disciple at the time of the irreversible initiation, they become one, and that is a gathering.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la yang rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi bug pa nas 'pho ba'i byang chub kyi sems de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rdo rje'i rtse mor 'dzin pa'i yan lag gis gzung ba ni 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa la yang rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi bug pa nas 'pho ba'i byang chub kyi sems de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rdo rje'i rtse mor 'dzin pa'i yan lag gis gzung ba ni 'dus pa'o //
translated: In the perfection stage, the bodhicitta that moves from the openings of the seventy-two thousand channels is held at the tip of the vajra by the branch of retention, which is the gathering of all the tathƒÅgatas.

original: yang na dngos po thams cad nye bar bsdus shing sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs sgom pa ni 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: yang na dngos po thams cad nye bar bsdus shing sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs sgom pa ni 'dus pa'o //
translated: Alternatively, the meditation on the form of the great seal, the nature of all buddhas and bodhisattvas, which is the gathering of all things, is the gathering.

original: de lta bu'i rnam pa du ma gzhung rgyas pa'i 'jigs pas 'dir ma bshad do ;
analyzed: de lta bu'i rnam pa du ma gzhung rgyas pa'i 'jigs pas 'dir ma bshad do ;
translated: Such varieties are not explained here for fear of being too wordy.

original: / gsang ba zhes bya ba brjod par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: / gsang ba zhes bya ba brjod par bya ba yin te /
translated: The so-called secret is to be expressed.

original: gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called the ‚ÄúSecret Gathering.‚Äù

original: tha mal pa'i lus ngag yid 'jig rten las 'das par byed pa ni gsang ba'o //
analyzed: tha mal pa'i lus ngag yid 'jig rten las 'das par byed pa ni gsang ba'o //
translated: The secret is the transcendence of ordinary body, speech, and mind.

original: sku la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid yi ge gsum gyi 'jug pa la sogs pa'i sgom pa ni gsang ba'o //
analyzed: sku la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid yi ge gsum gyi 'jug pa la sogs pa'i sgom pa ni gsang ba'o //
translated: The secret is the meditation on the three syllables, which are the nature of the body, and so forth, and the entry, and so forth.

original: yang na 'dod pa'i gdugs la sogs pa rtsa gsum du bde ba chen po myong ba ni gsang ba'o //
analyzed: yang na 'dod pa'i gdugs la sogs pa rtsa gsum du bde ba chen po myong ba ni gsang ba'o //
translated: Or else, the secret is the experience of great bliss in the three channels, such as the desire-world parasol, etc.

original: de bzhin du gzhan yang 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan yang 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: And so on, as will be explained later.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: sku gsung thugs ni rnam pa gsum //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs ni rnam pa gsum //
translated: The three, body, speech, and mind,

original: gsang ba zhes ni mngon par brjod //
analyzed: gsang ba zhes ni mngon par brjod //
translated: are called the secret.

original: 'dus pa bsdus par brjod pa ste //
analyzed: 'dus pa bsdus par brjod pa ste //
translated: The collection is said to be the collection,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad ming zhes bya'o //üîΩzhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad ming zhes bya'o // zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: and all the Buddhas are called the name.

original: rang gi glegs bam la blta ba bkag pa dang slob dpon gyis man ngag bstan par bya ba'i phyir /üîΩde ni dpal ldan klu sgrub las rnyed pa //
analyzed: rang gi glegs bam la blta ba bkag pa dang slob dpon gyis man ngag bstan par bya ba'i phyir / de ni dpal ldan klu sgrub las rnyed pa //
translated: In order to prohibit the reading of one's own book and to teach the esoteric instruction of the master,

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: it is said:üîΩThis was obtained from the glorious Nagarjuna.

original: de ni dpal klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyi dngos su slob ma nyid so sor bstan gyi brgyud pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni dpal klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyi dngos su slob ma nyid so sor bstan gyi brgyud pas ni ma yin no //
translated: This was obtained from the mouth of the glorious Nagarjuna himself, not from a disciple.

original: des 'dus pa'i tshig gi khyad par dang bcas par smra ba na rgyud kyi ming bstan to //
analyzed: des 'dus pa'i tshig gi khyad par dang bcas par smra ba na rgyud kyi ming bstan to //
translated: When he spoke with the special words of the collection, he taught the name of the Tantra.

original: brjod par bya ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to show the subject matter,

original: rim pa gnyis kyi gnas zhes bya ba smos pa la /
analyzed: rim pa gnyis kyi gnas zhes bya ba smos pa la /
translated: he says, ‚Äúthe abode of the two stages.‚Äù

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni rim pa gnyis so//
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni rim pa gnyis so//
translated: The two stages are the stage of generation and the stage of completion.

original: @78a * // de dag gi gnas ni 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: @78a * // de dag gi gnas ni 'dus pa'o //
translated: Their abode is the Guhyasamaja.

original: des de dag kho na bstan par bya ba ni brjod par bya ba yin gyi gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: des de dag kho na bstan par bya ba ni brjod par bya ba yin gyi gzhan ma yin no //
translated: That which is to be taught by that is the subject matter, not anything else.

original: rim pa gnyis po ni dbye ba dang mtshan nyid dang bcas par bshad zin to //
analyzed: rim pa gnyis po ni dbye ba dang mtshan nyid dang bcas par bshad zin to //
translated: The two stages have been explained along with their divisions and characteristics.

original: mtha' drug kyang bshad pa'i rgyud las shes par byas la rgyud go bar gyur pas 'grel pas ci zhig bya zhes de la bstan par bya ba'i phyir /üîΩsangs rgyas kun gyis rgyas btab pa //
analyzed: mtha' drug kyang bshad pa'i rgyud las shes par byas la rgyud go bar gyur pas 'grel pas ci zhig bya zhes de la bstan par bya ba'i phyir / sangs rgyas kun gyis rgyas btab pa //
translated: The six parameters should be understood from the explanatory tantra. What is the use of a commentary when the tantra has been understood? In order to show that,

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: he says, ‚Äúsealed by all the buddhas.‚Äù

original: dper na rgyal po rnams kyis rang gi mdzod la rgyas btab pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kun gyi man ngag gi gnas dag tu rdo rje'i tshig gis rgyud 'di la rgyas btab pa'o //
analyzed: dper na rgyal po rnams kyis rang gi mdzod la rgyas btab pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kun gyi man ngag gi gnas dag tu rdo rje'i tshig gis rgyud 'di la rgyas btab pa'o //
translated: Just as a king‚Äôs treasury is sealed by the king, this tantra is sealed by vajra words in the places of instruction of all the buddhas.

original: de bas na 'grel pa'i lde mig gis phye bar byas so //
analyzed: de bas na 'grel pa'i lde mig gis phye bar byas so //
translated: Therefore, it is opened by the key of the commentary.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' de ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' de ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is that Vajrasattva like?

original: khyab bdag ces smos te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab bdag ces smos te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is said to be the lord, because it is the master of all the Tathagatas.

original: gang gi phyir ye shes lnga ni tha dad pa ltar snang ba yin zhes kun rdzob kyi phyogs so //üîΩde dag nus pa thams cad nye bar bsdus pa na gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi gnas skabs su gyur pa thams cad stong pa'i mtshan nyid kyi de kho na nyid gang yin pa bcom ldan 'das te ye shes dang shes bya ro gcig pa rdo rje
analyzed: gang gi phyir ye shes lnga ni tha dad pa ltar snang ba yin zhes kun rdzob kyi phyogs so // de dag nus pa thams cad nye bar bsdus pa na gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi gnas skabs su gyur pa thams cad stong pa'i mtshan nyid kyi de kho na nyid gang yin pa bcom ldan 'das te ye shes dang shes bya ro gcig pa rdo rje
